Citadel_HeroBuilds_EditInstructions:
While the shop is in Build Editing Mode, clicking on items will add them to the currently selected build category, or if they are already present in that category, remove them. You can add multiple categories with custom names and descriptions, and resize them as desired.

You can also right click on items to remove them from the build or add comments from the build author.

Citadel_Library_Description:
By playing matches, you will earn chapter keys that you can use here to you can explore tales in the world of Deadlock.

For now, only one book is available: The Binding of Oathkeeper. In time, each hero will have their own story that you will be able to shape - allowing you to put your own fingerprint on the world.
Citadel_Library_Future_Desc: At this point in Friends and Family, the choices you make only impact the narrative itself.  However the long term goal is to make the choices you make tangible in a regular match; either by unique voice lines, cosmetic options, or a combination of the two.

Citadel_Settings_HudTelemetry_FrameTimeP: When the frame time exceeds this value, conditions are considered "poor."
Citadel_Settings_HudTelemetry_FrameTime_: Shows the worst recent frame time in milliseconds, and the current average frames per second.
Citadel_Settings_HudTelemetry_NetworkMis: When the percentage of ticks missed due to network misdelivery exceeds this value, conditions are considered "poor."

Shows the percentage of ticks that are not available at the time they are needed due to network loss or late delivery.

The rate in each direction (upstream to the server and downstream from the server) is displayed.

Network misdeliveries can often be automatically corrected, and missed ticks can be filled in with extra buffering. This number only counts ticks that are missed due to network misdelivery and not corrected.
Citadel_Settings_HudTelemetry_NetworkQua: Display network information on two lines. In addition to the ping and missed tick rate, the also shows the raw packet loss and jitter measurements.
Show a realtime graph of network jitter. Misdelivery events (loss, reordering, or excessive jitter) are highlighted.

Citadel_ranked_explainer_desc:
Ranked is a challenge mode that provides a more competitive Deadlock experience where you'll be matchmade with players of similar skill to determine your Skill Rank among the global population.

Each week, players can choose to join this competition by playing Ranked matches during their region's open time periods to demonstrate their individual skill.
Citadel_ranked_explainer_note: Badge designs will be revealed when the first ranks are awarded on Tuesday October 22nd.
Citadel_ranked_howitworks_desc:
All players start with the provisional Skill Rating of Obscurus until enough matches have been played to calibrate.

There are eleven different Skill Rating tiers, and within each tier, players will also be assigned a level from I to , which further distinguishes their position within that tier.

Each individual hero is assigned a matchmaking weighting relative to a player's Core Skill Rating (as indicated by arrows).

Unplayed heroes will always begin with lower relative weightings to your Core Skill Rating.

Skill Rating updates immediately post-match.

Only you can see your Skill Rating.
Citadel_ranked_scheduleModal_desc:

NewPlayer_YouAreFinished: You're ready! Try a bot match within Practice or Play your first game!
NotScored_Text: This game will not be scored.  It is now safe to leave.
Player_DisconnectReason_Idle: Disconnected from gameserver.  You were AFK for too long.
ReloadBullet_label: Applying an ionizing charge automatically reloads 1 bullet
ReportCard_DamageTaken_Desc: For incoming damage, less is more
ReportCard_GuardianDamage_Desc: Damage youve dealt to enemy objectives
ReportCard_KillGuardian_Desc: Take down anyone who stands in your way to victory!
ReportCard_LastHits_Desc: Achieve the last hit on Troopers and Enemy Heroes.
ReportCard_ModsPurchased_Desc: Buy an item at the Shop
ReportCard_NetWorth_Desc: Souls gained by killing troopers and shooting orbs
ReportCard_OrbsDeniedDesc: Steal an Orange orb from an enemy's kill by shooting it
ReportCard_OrbsSecuredDesc: Secure a Green orb by shooting it in the air
ReportCard_OrbsSecured_Desc: Shoot Blue Souls from felled enemies and Orange Souls stolen from your opponents.
ReportCard_PlayerDamage_Desc: Damage youve dealt to enemy heroes
ReportCard_PowerUp_Desc: Ride the Transit Line back to base and spend all your Souls and Ability Points
ReportCard_SoulsCollected_Desc: Collect 1000 souls from killing enemy troopers
SafeToAbandon_Text: This match can be abandoned without a penalty, but leaving will result in a loss.
Sandbox_Tutorial_Abilities_desc: Try using your Abilities by pressing {g:citadel_binding:'Ability1'}, {g:citadel_binding:'Ability2'}, {g:citadel_binding:'Ability3'} or {g:citadel_binding:'Ability4'}.
Sandbox_Tutorial_Completed_desc: Feel free to play around more. When youre done, leave Sandbox and start Lane Training.
Sandbox_Tutorial_Mods_desc: Go to the Shop to browse items. Try purchasing a few.
Sandbox_Tutorial_Movement_desc: Use this area to test out your controls.
Sandbox_Tutorial_Upgrades_desc: Hold {g:citadel_binding:'Default.Scoreboard'} to spend Ability Points to upgrade your Abilities.
Sandbox_Tutorial_Zipline_desc: Hold{g:citadel_binding:'Default.Mantle'}to get on the Transit Line. You can jump off by pressing{g:citadel_binding:'Default.Mantle'}
SecondHit_label: Double Strike a random hero in range.
SelectHeroFromRoster: Select a hero from your roster to play
SpawnTroopers_label: Spawn a melee trooper for each enemy hero trapped in the cage
StatDesc_AbilityDurationDesc: Ability Duration - Increases the duration of your Abilities and Items
StatDesc_AbilityRangeDesc: Ability Range - Increases range and radius of your Abilities and Items
StatDesc_AmmoDesc: Ammo - The number of shots in your gun before requiring a reload
StatDesc_BulletEvationDesc: Bullet Evasion - Percentage chance of dodging incoming bullets
StatDesc_FireRateDesc: Fire Rate - Percentage modification to your gun's rate of fire
StatDesc_HealingAmpDesc: Healing Amplification - Percentage modification of healing received
StatDesc_HealingBoostDesc: Healing Effectiveness - Percentage modification to the effectiveness of your healing abilities
StatDesc_RegenDesc: Health Regen - Amount of health you regen per second
StatDesc_SpiritLifestealDesc: Spirit Lifesteal - Amount of health you regain from dealing Spirit Damage
StatDesc_SpiritPowerDesc: Spirit Power - Increases the effectiveness of your Abilities and Items
StatDesc_SpiritResistDesc: Spirit Armor - Your resistance to incoming Spirit Damage
StatDesc_WeaponDamageDesc: Weapon Damage - Percentage modification to the damage of your Gun and Melee attacks
StatDesc_WeaponLifestealDesc: Weapon Lifesteal - Amount of health you regain from dealing Weapon Damage
StatDesc_WeaponResistDesc: Bullet Armor - Your resistance to incoming Bullet Damage
Steam_Citadel_Hideout_Ava: Playing With Ava in the Hideout
Steam_Citadel_Hideout_Cube: Wishing the Hideout was The Cube
Steam_Citadel_Hideout_Dead: Playing With The Dead in the Hideout
Steam_Citadel_Hideout_Dreams: Having Sweet Dreams in the Hideout
Steam_Citadel_Hideout_Fencer: Striving Towards Perfection in the Hideout
Steam_Citadel_Hideout_Glitter: Cleaning Up Glitter in the Hideout
Steam_Citadel_Hideout_Hangover: Figuring Out What Happened Last Night in the Hideout
Steam_Citadel_Hideout_Homesick: Wishing the Arroyos were in the Hideout
Steam_Citadel_Hideout_Knives: Playing With Knives in the Hideout
Steam_Citadel_Hideout_Lash: Thinking About Lash in the Hideout
Steam_Citadel_Hideout_Life: Grabbing a bite in the Hideout
Steam_Citadel_Hideout_Service: At Your Service in the Hideout
Steam_Citadel_Hideout_Wyoming: Dreaming of Wyoming in the Hideout
ability_afterburn_desc:
Weapon hits build up a burning effect, dealing {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDPS'}.

Bullets and abilities refresh the burn duration.
ability_afterburn_quip: Shoot enemies to set them on fire
ability_astro_rifle_desc: Equip a Rifle that deals spirit damage to hit Heroes and gives {s:hero_name} a stacking damage bonus against them.
ability_astro_rifle_t1_desc: Applies a {s:SlowPercent}% slow on hit. Lasts {s:SlowDurationPerStack}s per stack
ability_astro_shotgun_toggle_desc:
Use to toggle between your pistol and shotgun. The shotgun so powerful it forces {s:hero_name} to move the opposite direction of the shot while airborn.{g:citadel_binding:'Attack'}shoots forward and {g:citadel_binding:'ADS'} shoots behind you with a slight delay. The shotgun uses special bullets that does not benefit from ammo mods.

Lassoed units do not take damage when shooting backwards.
ability_bebop_stickybomb2_desc:
Throw a Sticky Bomb that explodes after a delay, dealing {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDamage'} to nearby enemies.

If the bomb hits a hero, it attaches to them and deals {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusSpiritDamage'}.
ability_bebop_stickybomb2_quip: Throw a sticky bomb on an enemy
ability_blood_bomb_desc:
Sacrifice some of your health to launch a bomb that deals damage after a brief arm time.
Self damage type is Spirit and can be mitigated.
ability_blood_bomb_quip: Sacrifice some health to launch a damaging bomb
ability_blood_bomb_t3_desc: Bombs leave a toxic mess on the ground, dealing 26% of the original damage per second, for 6s.
ability_blood_shards_desc: Sacrifice some of your health to launch blood shards that apply a stack of Malice. Each stack slows the victim and increases the damage they take from you. The slow effect decreases over time.
ability_blood_shards_quip: Stack damage amplification on an enemy
ability_boho_bouncyprojectile_desc:
Throw a projectile that bounces between targets, dealing {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDamage'}.

If there are no enemies nearby Skipshot will instead bounce off of Boho, reducing its cooldown.
ability_boho_damageshare_desc: Enemies hit by {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDamage'} are linked to other linked enemies, sharing a portion of incoming damage as {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusSpiritDamage'}.
ability_boho_doublehit_desc:
Swing twice, dealing {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDamage'} to targets in front.

Hits against heroes grant {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusMoveSpeed'} and stacking {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'CombatBarrier'}.
ability_bookworm_aoemagic_desc:
Target an area with latent magic, applying {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'Slow'}.

The magic detonates after a delay, dealing {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDamage'} and applying {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'Immobilize'}.
ability_bookworm_aoemagic_t3_desc: On Hit: Reduce Spirit Resist by -18% for 6s
ability_bookworm_dragonfire_desc: Conjure a dragon that appears at the target location before flying forward, dealing {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDamage'} and leaving a burning path in its trail.
ability_bookworm_knightbarrier_desc: Grant an ally a {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'CombatBarrier'}. While the barrier holds, they gain {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusWeaponDamage'}.
ability_bookworm_knightbarrier_t3_desc: Up to 2 additional allies gain 75% Barrier
ability_bookworm_knightcharge_desc:
Release a wave of spectral knights and steeds that charge across the entire city, {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'Healing'} allies and dealing {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDamage'} to enemies.

The strength of the {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'Heal'} and {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDamage'} is amplified as the knights travel further.
ability_bookworm_knightcharge_t3_desc: +135 Damage and +0.5s Stun Duration
ability_bounce_pad_desc:
Drop a bounce pad in the world that launches any hero.

You explode on landing, dealing Damage to any nearby enemies. The explosion can only occur once per Bounce Pad.
ability_bounce_pad_t2_desc: You and allies gain a +4m/s move speed bonus for 4s on landing
ability_bounce_pad_t3_desc: +67.5 Stomp Damage. Improve Spirit scaling
ability_bullet_flurry_desc: Enter a flurry, firing your weapon at nearby enemies with perfect accuracy and added Bullet Damage.
ability_bullet_flurry_quip: Unleash a flurry of bullets around you
ability_bullet_flurry_t3_desc:
+60% Bullet Evasion and
+3m/s Dance Movespeed
ability_burrow2_desc: Burrow underground, gaining Movement Speed and Armor. Jumping out deals Damage and knocks enemies into the air.
ability_burrow_desc:
Burrow underground, moving faster, and gaining spirit and bullet armor. Damage from enemy heroes will reduce the speed bonus.

When you jump out, deal {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDamage'}, {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'Slow'}, and {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'KnockUp'}.
ability_burrow_quip: Travel underground, emerging with spin damage
ability_burrow_t3_desc: -19 Cooldown and +2m/s Move Speed
ability_cadence_charm_desc:
Glance in a target direction, dealing Damage to the first enemy hit and marking them.

If the victim was already marked, they instead take additional Damage and become Charmed.

Charmed enemies are forced to run towards you, but at reduced speeds.
ability_cadence_tempo_bullet_desc: Casting an ability empowers your next {s:MaxProcCount} bullets. Empowered bullets deal bonus Damage and reduce all your Cooldowns .
ability_carpetbomb_drone_desc: Summon a drone that drops bombs as it flies. The Drone moves towards the aimed direction. Drone explodes in to a cluster of bombs when it expires
ability_carpetbomb_drone_t2_desc: Ability Cooldown {s:AbilityCooldown}s and Drone Health +{s:DroneHealth}
ability_carpetbomb_drone_t3_desc: Bomb drop interval {s:AttackRate}s and Drone speed +{s:DroneSpeed}
ability_charged_shot_desc: Charge up a powerful shot that pierces through enemies. Hold {g:citadel_binding:'Ability1'} or {g:citadel_binding:'Attack'} to hold the shot.
ability_charged_shot_quip: Charge up a long range shot
ability_charged_shot_t3_desc: Improved damage scaling and -3s Charge Delay
ability_crackshot_desc:
Headshots deal bonus Damage and applies a Fading Move Speed penalty. This effect can only occur when off cooldown.

Cooldown is reduced by 50% on NPC hits.
Crackshot ignores range damage fall-off and does not apply to objectives.
ability_crackshot_t3_desc: -4s Cooldown on Hero Headshots. -2s on NPC Headshots
ability_death_tax_desc: Enemies injured by Lady Geist are marked with Death Tax. Whenever a marked enemy dies, {s:hero_name} gains health.
ability_death_tax_t1_desc: Reduce one of your Cooldowns by {s:CooldownReductionOnKill}s when a marked enemy dies
ability_death_tax_t3_desc: Increase Spirit Power by {s:TechPowerAmpBonus} for {s:TechPowerAmpBonusDuration}s when a marked enemy dies. Stacks up to {s:TechPowerAmpBonusMaxStacks} times.
ability_digger_mudshield_desc: Gain Bullet Shield, and reduce incoming bullet damage. After {s:ShieldDuration}s or if the ability is reactivated, the shield explodes, dealing damage based on the remaining shield.
ability_doorman_bomb_desc:
Throw out a call bell that deals {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDamage'} on impact. After a short delay it explodes, dealing additional {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDamage'} and causing affected enemies to suffer reduced weapon accuracy and movement {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'Slow'}.

Can be shot to detonate early.
ability_doorman_doorway_desc:
Place two connected doors in the world. Players and most projectiles entering one door will exit out through the other. The doors will close at the end of the duration, or if the ability is activated again.

The two doors must be placed within the doorway distance of each other.
ability_doorman_doorway_t2_desc: Grants a Barrier first time traveling through doors
ability_doorman_hotel_desc:
Send the target's physical body to be a guest at the Baroness Hotel. The guest is to promptly make their way to the exit elevator, where they'll be sent back to their original position.

A stay at the Baroness Hotel is paid for in {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDamage'}. Failure to check-out on time costs additional {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDamage'}.
ability_doorman_luggage_cart_desc:
Send out a luggage Cart that deals {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDamage'} and {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'Pulls'} enemy heroes along its path.

Can be alt cast with {g:citadel_binding:'AltCast'} to target friendly heroes instead.
ability_doorman_luggage_cart_t3_desc: +45 Cart Damage and deal 117 Damage and 1.2s {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'Stun'} on wall impact
ability_doorman_luggage_cart_t3_note: If the cart collides with a wall while dragging an enemy, it will {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'Stun'} the targets and deal additional {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDamage'}.
ability_drifter_hunger_active_desc: Active: Accentuate your senses, revealing a trail that leads to nearby heroes.
ability_drifter_hunger_desc: When enemy heroes are low on health you deal amplified damage against them. These enemies leave a lingering blood trail as they move.
ability_drifter_hunger_passive_desc:
Isolated heroes leave a trail as they move, and emit their heartbeat from afar.

You deal amplified damage against isolated heroes, and killing them grants you permanent {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'WeaponDamage'}.
ability_drifter_hunger_t1_desc: +2m/s Move Speed when around an isolated enemy hero
ability_drifter_hunger_t2_desc: On isolated kill: reduces the cooldown of all your abilities by 15s and restores 3 stamina
ability_empowerbullet_desc:
Performing a Dash or Slide loads your weapon with an empowered bullet that deals bonus Damage, equal to a percentage of your Weapon Damage.

If you're out of bullets, you'll find an extra one. How lucky.
ability_empowerbullet_t1_desc: Gain +{s:BonusMoveSpeed} m/s Move Speed while empowered
ability_empowerbullet_t2_desc: Deal an additional +{s:BulletArmorReduction}% weapon damage for {s:DebuffDuration}s against the victim
ability_explosive_barrel_desc:
Throw a barrel that explodes after a delay, dealing {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDamage'} and applying {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'KnockUp'}.

The barrel can be detonated early by being shot, melee'd, or detonated by another barrel.
ability_explosive_barrel_quip: Throw a barrel that explodes when shot
ability_explosive_trap_desc: A bomb that launches everything it hits up in the air. Manually detonate by pressing [1] after arming. Useful for mobility.
ability_explosive_trap_t1_desc: ArmTime decreased by {s:ArmTime} and Blast Force +{s:Force}
ability_explosive_trap_t3_desc: Bomb throw range +{s:ProjectileSpeedBonus}% and damage +{s:Damage}
ability_familiar_ability01_desc:
Rem's eyes cast your gaze forward, piercing walls and floors. Enemies in the gaze are slowed, reduced dash distance, and cannot use movement abilities.

When the channel ends they fall asleep before waking up to a splitting headache that deals heavy {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDamage'}.
ability_familiar_ability01_t1_desc: -1 Stamina On Wake and no Stamina Regen while sleeping
ability_familiar_ability01_t2_desc: Unstoppable and reduced damage while channeling
ability_familiar_ability02_desc:
Throw your trusty pillow inflicting {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDamage'} and heavy {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'KnockBack'}.

Landing hits reduces the cooldown of your other abilities.
ability_familiar_attach_desc:
Jump to an ally and nap alongside them. Both you and the ally receive a burst {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'Heal'} based on missing health followed by lingering {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'Regen'}.

Hop between allies with {g:citadel_binding:'Ability2'} to refresh the duration, once per ally.

You are knocked off if stunned by an ultimate ability.
You can use items and all self-casts target your ally instead.
ability_familiar_attach_t2_desc: Bonus Item Range, Duration, and Barrier Effectiveness while napping
ability_familiar_attach_t3_desc: Bonus spirit power while napping and for a short duration after waking
ability_familiar_attach_trigger_desc: Hop to another ally and refresh the {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'Regen'} duration, once per ally.
ability_familiar_helpinghands_desc:
Send one of your Helpers to do chores in an area. They can collect boxes, do Sinner's Sacrifices, and be sent to follow allies.

Follow a hero: Provides a short burst of {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritResist'} and fading {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'MoveSpeed'}.

Follow a trooper: Provides healing, damage, resists, and allows tagging along. When no hero is around, souls from trooper kills are split amongst the team.

Can be cast during Tag Along. Helpers will take a nap for 15.1s after following someone.
ability_fire_bomb_desc:
Become a living bomb, dealing {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDamage'} and applying {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'Stun'} to all nearby enemies after a delay.

Once cast, Concussive Combustion cannot be interrupted.
ability_fire_bomb_quip: Stun all nearby enemies after a short delay
ability_fire_bomb_t2_desc: +0.5s Stun Duration and +3m Radius
ability_fire_bomb_t3_desc:
+94.5 Damage.
On Hero Hit: Heal for 70% of damage
ability_flame_dash_desc:
Dash forward, gaining {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SlowResistance'} while leaving a flaming trail that deals {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDPS'}.

Hold{g:citadel_binding:'MoveForward'}while active to dash farther.
ability_flame_dash_quip: Blaze forward, leaving a flame trail in your wake
ability_flame_dash_t1_desc: On Hit: -25% Fire Rate for 6s
ability_flame_dash_t3_desc: Enable Ability Charges and -15s Ability Cooldown
ability_frank_painaura_desc:
Unleash pain, dealing {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDPS'} to both enemies and yourself.

The damage continues to increase the longer the ability is channeled, up to a maximum amount.
ability_frank_painaura_t2_desc: +8 Min DPS and +36 Max DPS
ability_frank_revive_desc: Reanimate after taking lethal damage, dealing {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDamage'} and applying {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'Stun'} to nearby enemies.
ability_frank_revive_t3_desc: While On Cooldown: Gain 18% Fire Rate and 9 Spirit Damage per Bullet
ability_frank_selfzap_desc: Deal {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDamage'} to yourself. Then, gain bonus {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'Regen'} and {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusMoveSpeed'}, decaying over time.
ability_frank_selfzap_t3_desc: -4s Cooldown. On Cast: Purge non-ultimate debuffs
ability_frank_shocktarget2_desc:
Taking any damage passively charges up your Pain Battery.

Once full, activating the ability fires multiple shocking bolts, dealing {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDamage'} once per target.
ability_frank_shocktarget2_t1_desc: On Hit: Apply 40% Slow for 2s
ability_frank_shocktarget2_t3_desc: On Hero Hit: Heal for 18% of your missing health
ability_frank_shocktarget_desc:
Zap a target in front of you, dealing {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDamage'} and applying a brief {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'Slow'}.

Incoming damage is stored as additional {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusSpiritDamage'} on your next cast, up to a maximum amount.
ability_frank_shocktarget_desc_t3bonus: The target then shocks a nearby target, dealing {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDPS'}.
ability_gravity_lasso_desc:
Throw out your lasso, dealing {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDamage'}, {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'Pulling'}, and applying {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'Stun'}.
Using a Bounce Pad extends the duration of Spirit Lasso.
ability_gravity_lasso_quip: Grab an enemy and drag them behind you
ability_guided_arrow_desc:
After 1.5s cast time, launch a spirit owl that you control and which explodes on impact, damaging and stunning enemies. Hold{g:citadel_binding:'MoveForward'}to accelerate the owl.
Press{g:citadel_binding:'Mantle'}to release control. Gain permanent Spirit Power for each enemy hero killed with Guided Owl.
ability_guided_arrow_quip: Fly your owl to damage enemies from afar
ability_guided_arrow_t3_desc: After hit, kills enemies that are below 22% Health
ability_gunslinger_demon_carbine_desc: Load your weapon with demonic rounds. After a delay, you empower your next shots to deal bonus damage and penetrate enemies.
ability_gunslinger_salvo_desc:
Load your weapon with demonic rounds. After a delay, release a blitz of bullets at the target enemy, dealing bonus Damage.

Enemies can intercept the bullets.
ability_gunslinger_spreadingfire_desc:
Throw a projectile, infused with an imp's spirit. It posseses the enemy, dealing Damage over time.

If the target dies while possessed, the imp jumps to another nearby enemy, refreshing its duration.
ability_gunslinger_spreadingfire_t3_desc: +{s:DPS} DPS. Spreads to +{s:SpreadTargets} targets after death.
ability_hat_trick_desc: Throws out her hat to strike enemies, slowing and revealing them through walls.
ability_hat_trick_quip: Throws her hat strike and reveal enemies
ability_head_stomp_desc: {s:hero_name} has more movement control while airborne and gains the ability to bounce off enemy heads after getting enough Air Speed.  Head Stomping an enemy will stun them.
ability_heal_drone_desc:
Deploy a medic drone which slowly heals you and a nearby teammate.
Replaces any other drone.
ability_health_swap_desc: Swaps health levels with an enemy target. There is a minimum health percentage that enemies can be brought down to and a minimum amount of health received based on victims current health.
ability_health_swap_quip: Swap your current health with an enemy hero's
ability_health_swap_t2_desc: On cast, +35% Fire Rate for 8s.
ability_heavy_drone_desc: Creates a helper drone that can be toggled between providing Healing, Speed or Rockets. Drones take a short time to activate after being switched.
ability_heavy_rage_desc: Passive - Increases Heavy's gun damage by {s:DamageMultiplierPercent}% each time it hits an enemy, up to {s:StacksPerEntity} stacks per enemy Hero and NPCs
ability_heavy_rage_t1_desc: Max stacks per enemy Hero or NPCs +{s:StacksPerEntity}
ability_heavy_rage_t3_desc: Gain {s:StacksOnTakeDamage} stacks when an enemy damages Heavy
ability_hijack_richochet_projectile_desc: Throws a dagger which bounces off walls and launches towards nearby enemies. Pierces and deals damage to any enemy units it hits. Damage increases after first bounce off wall.
ability_ice_dome_desc:
Kelvin freezes the air around him, creating an impenetrable dome around himself. While in the dome, allies rapidly regenerate health and enemies are slowed.
Objectives becomes Invulnerable and Frozen under Frozen Shelter.
ability_ice_dome_t3_desc: +50 Health Regen and now scales with Spirit Power
ability_ice_grenade_desc: Throw a grenade that explodes in a cloud of freezing ice, damaging and reducing the move speed of enemies.
ability_ice_grenade_t2_desc: Frost Grenade now heals 80 HP to friendly targets. Scales with Spirit.
ability_icebeam_desc: Shoot freezing cold energy out in front of you, damaging targets and progressively reducing their movement and fire rate the longer you sustain the beam on them. You have reduced move speed while using Arctic Beam. The beam may also claim Souls.
ability_icebeam_t3_desc: Fires 2 additional Arctic Beams toward enemies within 10m of the last target hit
ability_icepath_desc:
Kelvin creates a floating trail of ice and snow that gives movement bonuses to him and his allies. Kelvin gains 60% slow resistance for the duration. Enemies can also walk on the floating trail.
Press {g:citadel_binding:'Roll'} / {g:citadel_binding:'Crouch'} to travel up or down while in Ice Path.
ability_icepath_quip: Speed around on a floating path of ice
ability_icepath_t3_desc: While active, gain +1 Spirit Power per meter of Ice Path trail created. Max of 90 Spirit Power
ability_immobilize_trap_desc:
Throw out a trap that begins to arm itself. Once armed, the trap will trigger when an enemy enters its radius, applying Curse and Movement Slow that interrupts, Silences, Disarms, and prevents item usage.
Hit the trap with a Charged Shot to detonate early with increased radius.
ability_immobilize_trap_quip: Place a trap that restricts enemy movement
ability_immobilize_trap_t3_desc: +1s Curse Duration and +1.5m Radius
ability_incendiary_projectile_desc: Spew an incendiary mixture, dealing {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDamage'}, applying {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'Slow'}, and coating targets in napalm.
ability_incendiary_projectile_quip: Spew napalm that amplifies your damage
ability_incendiary_projectile_t3_desc: Napalm Effect: +17% Damage Taken and -33% Healing
ability_intimidate_desc: Deal damage to nearby enemies and heal yourself based on the damage done. Heal is stronger against enemy heroes.
ability_intimidate_quip: Damage enemies nearby, healing from each hit
ability_intimidate_t3_desc: Adds a debuff to enemies that lets Mo & Krill deal +15% Damage to them. Stacks and lasts 16s.
ability_kali_dust_storm_desc: Send out a tornado that damages enemies it touches, as well as applying a lingering movement and fire rate slow.
ability_kali_dust_storm_quip: Send out a tornado that slows enemies
ability_kali_tornado_blade_desc: Throw a blade that deals damage to everything around it. Press the skill's Ability key to stop Whirling Blade in place and to expand its size. Deals additional damage on expansion.
ability_kali_trappers_bolo_desc: Throw a bolo that bounces between enemy heroes before returning to you. Victims will slow down over 2s and then become immobilized for 2s. Bounces once per hero.
ability_kali_trappers_bolo_t1_desc: Enemies hit by the bolo give {s:ReverseLifeLeech}% Lifesteal for {s:ReverseLifeLeechDuration}s
ability_lash_flog_desc: Strike enemies in front of you with your whip, {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'Healing'} for a portion of the damage dealt.
ability_lash_flog_quip: Heals from targets ahead of you
ability_life_drain_desc:
Create a tether that drains enemy health over time and heals you. Target must be in line of sight and within max range to drain. You can shoot and use other abilities during the drain, but your move speed is reduced.
{g:citadel_binding:'AltCast'} to give health to friendly Heroes.
ability_life_drain_quip: Steal health from an enemy over time
ability_life_drain_t3_desc: Ability becomes charged and grants +1 Charge
ability_magician_animalcurse_desc:
Hex a target, transforming them into a Rabbit for a limited duration.

Rabbits are small and move faster, but take increased Damage and are unable to perform most actions.
Hex does not interrupt abilities.
ability_magician_animalcurse_quip: Transform your enemy into a rabbit
ability_magician_animalhexarea_desc:
Hex a target area and transforming all enemies into a Rabbit for a limited duration.

Rabbits are small and move faster, but take increased Damage and are unable to perform most actions.
Hex does not interrupt abilities.
ability_magician_animalhexarea_t3_desc: +7% Damage Amp and +3m Radius
ability_magician_bigbolt_desc: Prepare three AMAZING bolts of magic. Each bolt applies a Fading Slow and deals Spirit Damage, increased for every bolt fired.
ability_magician_bigbolt_t3_desc: +{s:DamagePerShot} Damage Per Bolt. Refund {s:BoltRefundPerKill} Bolt per Kill
ability_magician_cloneturret_desc:
Summon an Assistant at the targeted location. The Assistant attacks whenever you fire your weapon, dealing Damage.

While the Assistant is out, you can press {g:citadel_binding:'Ability2'} to swap positions with your Assistant.

Casting Spectral Assistant also reloads your weapon.
ability_magician_cloneturret_t3_desc: +60% Fire Rate and +12.6 Assistant Damage
ability_magician_copyult_desc:
Copy the Ultimate of an enemy hero for a limited time. Reactivating the ability will use the Copied Ultimate instead.

Copies will inherit this ability's upgrade points.
Audience Participation will also copy the cooldown.
ability_magician_copyult_quip: Copy an enemy's Ultimate for a limited time
ability_magician_escape_desc:
Blink to the target location. On arrival, briefly gain movement speed and become Invisible.

[Cast] Appear at the target location.
{g:citadel_binding:'AltCast'} Appear in place.
Enemies will not know which cast you performed.
ability_magician_magicbolt_desc:
Fire a bolt of magic that deals Damage, increasing as it travels. If you have an Assistant, they also cast Vexing Bolt at reduced damage.

Press {g:citadel_binding:'Ability1'} to redirect the bolt towards your crosshairs.
ability_magician_magicbolt_quip: Launch a guided bolt of magic
ability_magician_magicbolt_t1_desc: Bolts apply -25% Fire Rate for 5s.
ability_magician_magicbolt_t3_desc: +126 Max Damage. +50% Assistant Damage.
ability_magician_shadowclone_desc:
Create a Copy of yourself with reduced health and damage. When the clone dies or expires it explodes, dealing Spirit Damage.

The Copy cannot use their Ultimate ability.
ability_magician_shadowclone_t3_desc: Copy can cast their Ultimate Ability.
ability_magician_stage_desc: Target an enemy. You and the target enemy are bound on Stage, unable to leave. All other characters are pushed out of the radius.
ability_mirv_grenade_buff_desc: Tempoarily turns {s:hero_name}'s primary weapon attack to explode in to a cluster of bombs.
ability_mirv_grenade_buff_t1_desc: Adds +{s:Grenades} bomb per cluster and +{s:AbilityDuration}s duration
ability_mirv_grenade_buff_t3_desc: Infinite Shots while Mad Bomber is active
ability_nano_catform_desc:
Turn to shadows and possess Ava. You gain {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusMoveSpeed'} and become hidden on the minimap, but cannot use your weapon or cast abilities.
{g:citadel_keybind:'AbilityMelee'} : Pounce to break boxes.

When taking damage from an enemy hero, bonus move speed is reduced by 65% and you are unable to activate Ava for 6s.
ability_nano_catform_t3_desc: -20s Cooldown. Gain 35 Health Regen during Ava.
ability_nano_clustergrenade_desc:
Throw a cluster of bombs that detonate after a delay, dealing {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDamage'}.

Enemies hit by multiple bombs take 65% damage.
ability_nano_dash_desc:
Dash forward before slashing all enemies in a circle, dealing {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'MeleeDamage'}.

If the ability hits at least one hero, {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'Heal'} a small amount of health.
ability_nano_pounce_desc:
Leap at a target to inflict Light Melee damage and slow on nearby enemies.
You may use Pounce on a second target if used within {s:DoublePounceTime}s
ability_nano_pounce_t2_desc: Reloads up to {s:ActiveReloadPercent}% of your ammo and applies +{s:FireRateSlow}% Fire Rate Slow.
ability_nano_proximity_ritual_desc: Deploy a Statue to track enemies in an area. The Ward will also attack enemies recently damaged by {s:hero_name}. Targeted enemies have reduced healing and heal {s:hero_name} when damaged.
ability_nano_proximity_ritual_quip: Deploy a statue that survey's an area
ability_nano_proximity_ritual_t1_desc: Statues gain Invisibility when not attacking.
ability_nano_proximity_ritual_t3_desc: {s:StatueVictimDamageReduction}% Damage Reduction and {s:HealAmpReceivePenaltyPercent}% Heal Reduction on targets.
ability_nano_shadow_pulse_desc:
Instantly turn to shadows, becoming untargetable, gaining {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusMoveSpeed'}, and dealing {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDamage'}.

After a delay, return from the shadows, dealing {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDamage'} again.
ability_nano_shadow_pulse_quip: Turn to Shadows, gaining movespeed and dealing delayed damage
ability_nano_shadow_pulse_t3_desc: Refund all cooldowns and gain 18% Damage for 6s.
ability_nano_shadow_step_desc: Mark your enemies and bathe yourself in shadow to strengthen your attacks and make yourself Invisible. Attacking will only temporarily reveal you. Hitting enemies with Melee damage will reduce their bullet resist (stacking)
ability_nano_shadow_step_quip: Enter the shadows to gain the advantage on your enemies
ability_nano_shadow_step_t3_desc: Heavy Melee attacks cause Silence for {s:SilenceOnHeavyDuration}s
ability_necro_coffin_desc:
Gain a {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'CombatBarrier'} and {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusMoveSpeed'}.

When the barrier expires you release a ring of necrotic energy, dealing {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDamage'} and applying {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'Slow'}.
ability_necro_fear_desc: Your weapon steals {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'WeaponDamage'} and {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritResist'} over time, up to a maximum amount per target.
ability_necro_fear_t3_desc: Weapon can attach to an additional target
ability_necro_gravestone_desc_1: Create a gravestone at a target location that summons ghouls over time. Enemies can destroy the gravestone with two heavy melees.
ability_necro_gravestone_desc_2: Ghouls shamble towards the enemy base, dealing {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'MeleeDamage'}. They explode when they approach a hero or objective, dealing {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDamage'} in an area and applying a brief {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'Slow'}
ability_necro_gravestone_t2_desc: +25% Ghoul Speed and +10s Duration
ability_necro_gravestone_t3_desc: Explosions deal +5% Current Health damage. 3 Ghouls instantly spawn on-cast.
ability_necro_haunt_desc:
Grant an ally {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusMoveSpeed'} and spectres which orbit around them.

The spectres will seek nearby enemies, dealing {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDamage'} and applying {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'Slow'}.
ability_necro_hauntingskull_desc:
Passive: Collect death when anything dies nearby and store it in your Jar of Dead.

Active: Throw a jar to summon Deadheads that repeatedly deal {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDamage'} to enemies.

Deadheads follow you instead if there's no nearby enemies, and prioritize the target of your weapon.
ability_necro_hauntingskull_t1_desc: Collecting death heals {'Value': 5, 'Scale': {'Value': 0.1, 'Type': 'spirit'}} health per pickup
ability_necro_hauntingskull_t2_desc: On Hit: Apply 30% Slow for 1s
ability_necro_hauntingskull_t3_desc: +2 Deadheads. Deadheads now trigger Essence Theft
ability_necro_killsummon_desc:
Kill a Ghoul or low-health ally, gaining their lifeforce.

{g:citadel_binding:'Attack'}: Throw the lifeforce as a bomb, dealing {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDamage'}.
{g:citadel_binding:'AltCast'}: Consume the lifeforce, receiving {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'Healing'}.
ability_necro_summonskele_desc:
Unearth a buried ghoul that shambles towards the enemy base, dealing {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'MeleeDamage'}.

It explodes when it dies or approaches a hero, dealing {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDamage'} and applying a brief {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'Slow'}.

Alt-Cast {g:citadel_binding:'AltCast'} causes the spawned ghoul to remain in place.
Ghouls prioritize the target of your weapon.
ability_necro_summonskele_t3_desc: +{s:GhoulHealth} Ghoul Health, and Ghouls also unearth at every Gravestone
ability_necro_wither_desc_1: Enemies hit by your weapon begin to wither, applying increasing {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'Slow'} and reduced {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritResist'}.
ability_necro_wither_desc_2:
Enemies who die while withered spawn Deadheads that chase nearby enemies, dealing {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDamage'}.

Deadheads will follow you instead if there are no enemies nearby.
Deadheads will prioritize the target of your weapon.
ability_necro_zombiewall_desc:
Unearth a line of grasping hands, dealing {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDamage'} and applying {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'Immobilize'} to enemies when they pass through.

Alt-Cast {g:citadel_binding:'AltCast'} rotates the orientation of the wall.
ability_overcharge_desc: Temporarily boosts the effect of Heavy's current drone and increases his fire rate.
ability_perched_predator_desc:
Send a Spirit Cat forward that grab's targets in its way. Grabbing a Hero will cause an explosion soon after.
Press {g:citadel_binding:'Ability1'} to manually create the explosion.
ability_perched_predator_quip: Send out a Spirit Cat to grab enemies
ability_power_jump_desc:
Launches you high in the air, allowing you to glide slowly. While airborne, you gain Weapon Damage and multishot on your weapon.
{g:citadel_binding:'AltCast'}for reduced jump height.
Press{g:citadel_binding:'Mantle'}to cancel the glide.
ability_power_jump_quip: Jump high up in the air and unleash multishots
ability_power_jump_t2_desc: While airborne, +5 Weapon Damage and weapon damage applies 40% movement slow for 1.5s
ability_power_jump_t3_desc: While airborne, +30% Bullet Lifesteal, +30% Spirit Lifesteal and +30% Bullet Evasion
ability_power_surge_desc: Power up your weapon with a shock effect, making your bullets proc shock damage on your target. This shock damage bounces to enemies near your target. Occurs once per burst shot.
ability_power_surge_quip: Create electric arcs with your shots
ability_power_surge_t2_desc: Shock Damage applies -10% Spirit Resist for 6s
ability_power_surge_t3_desc: +11 Shock Damage, improved Spirit scaling, and +3 Max Jumps
ability_priest_antispiritvest_desc: Gain passive {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'CombatBarrier'} that grants {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BulletResist'} and {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritResist'}. The barrier repairs itself when out of combat.
ability_priest_antispiritvest_t3_desc: On Barrier Break: Gain {s:BaseAttackDamagePercent}% Weapon Damage for {s:BuffDuration}s
ability_priest_barrage_desc: Equip your crossbow, changing your weapon to deal {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'PureDamage'} and apply a brief {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'Slow'}.
ability_priest_beartrap_desc:
Kick a trap that arms after a brief delay.

The trap springs on the first enemy it touches, dealing {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDamage'}, applying {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'Immobilize'}, and revealing enemies for a duration afterwards.
ability_priest_beartrap_t3_desc: You deal +20% damage against targets
ability_priest_flashbang_desc:
Fire a grenade that bounces before exploding, dealing {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'WeaponDamage'} and setting enemies on fire.

Burning targets deal {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'PureDamage'} to enemies in the area and suffer from reduced healing.
ability_priest_flashbang_t3_desc: -20% Healing Reduction and allow Charges
ability_priest_knockback_desc: Fire a blast with your shotgun, dealing {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'WeaponDamage'} and pushing enemies back. Enemies near a wall receive {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'Stun'} and take {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusWeaponDamage'}.
ability_priest_knockback_t2_desc: -8s Ability Cooldown and +2.5m Ability Range
ability_priest_knockback_t3_desc: On Wall Stun: Your next heavy melee is blessed
ability_priest_selfheal_desc:
Burn your censer, reducing incoming damage and {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'Healing'} over time.

You cannot attack while Potent Vapors is active.
ability_priest_silencebomb_desc: Throw a censer that leaves a spreading cloud. Enemies caught in the cloud are Slowed and Silenced.
ability_priest_smokegrenade_desc: Throw a tear gas grenade that detonates after a delay, blocking vision. Enemies in the area have {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'ReducedFireRate'}.
ability_priest_smokegrenade_t2_desc: On Debuff: Drain {s:StaminaDrain} Stamina per Second
ability_priest_stackingdefense_desc: Taking damage grants stacking {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BulletResist'} and {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritResist'} that expires over time.
ability_priest_weaponswap_desc:
Load your crossbow with 3 stakes, dealing massively increased {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'WeaponDamage'}.

The final stake is blessed, dealing bonus {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'PureDamage'} and executing low-health enemies.
ability_priest_weaponswap_t1_desc: While Active: Gain 1.2 m/s Move Speed
ability_priest_weaponswap_t2_desc: -15s Ability Cooldown and +150 Bonus Damage
ability_propulsion_gel_desc: Fire a wave of propulsion gel that grants increased move speed for allies. Unit's hit by the gel wave will be covered by gel and leave a trail behind them
ability_propulsion_gel_t1_desc: Gel reduces zoomed and shooting move speed penalty by {s:ShootingSpeedPenaltyReduction}% to friendly units
ability_punkgoat_blasted_desc: Passive: Melee hits restore ammo and inflict wrecked on the victim.
ability_punkgoat_blasted_t2_desc: +1 Bashdown Charge on use and +7% Wrecked Bullet Amp
ability_punkgoat_blastedactive_desc:
Active: Empower your weapons. Melee boosts {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'MaxHealth'} and bullets are amplified against wrecked enemies.
Deal weapon damage to remain Blasted longer.
ability_punkgoat_goatflip_desc: Charge head-first into an enemy and send them into the air along with Billy.
ability_punkgoat_goatflip_t3_desc: On Impact: Deal 6.5% max health as {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDamage'}
ability_punkgoat_tether_desc:
Chain nearby enemies to you. Chained enemies cannot use movement abilities and receive a heavy {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'Slow'} when they pull on the chain.

After a delay, yank everyone towards Billy and deal {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDamage'}.

The chain breaks if you lose line of sight for a short while.
ability_punkgoat_ult_desc:
Slam your bat into the ground, {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'Pulling'} enemies down and dealing {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'MeleeDamage'}.

The slam creates a shockwave that deals {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDamage'} and applies {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'KnockUp'}.
ability_rocket_drone_desc: Deploy a drone which shoots homing rockets at enemies at close range that slows enemies.
ability_rocket_drone_t1_desc: The Drone adds {s:ClipReloadPercentagePerSecond}% of max clip per second to Heavy's gun
ability_rocket_drone_t2_desc: The Drone applies health regen to Heavy and a nearby target for {s:DroneHealthRegen} health per second .
ability_scrap_blast_desc: Shoots out a blast of consumed remains, damaging and slowing enemies. Multiple hits increase the slow.
ability_scrap_blast_quip: Shoot a blast of bio mass
ability_self_purge_desc: Drags enemies towards heavy and causes an explosion.
ability_self_purge_t1_desc: Permanent Ammo +{s:ClipBonusOnHit} for every enemy Hero hit by the explosion
ability_skyrunner_flakshot_desc: Bullets deal {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusWeaponDamage'} and can ricochet off of surfaces.
ability_skyrunner_swingline_desc:
Fire a line that attaches to the world, allowing you to swing.

Lifethread resets all air jumps and air dashes.
ability_sleep_dagger_desc: Throw a dagger that damages and sleeps the target. Sleeping targets wake up shortly after being damaged. Throwing a Dagger does not break your invisibility. Sleep Dagger does not interrupt enemies' channeling abilities.
ability_sleep_dagger_t2_desc: -12 Cooldown and -60% stamina recovery for 6s on wake-up
ability_sleep_dagger_t3_desc: Applies -12% Bullet Resist and -35% Fire Rate for 6s on wake-up.
ability_slingshot_bruising_shot_desc: Hits damage the target, and stack bruises on them that increase all subsequent damage taken from Slingshot's weapon and abilities.
ability_slingshot_bruising_shot_t1_desc: +{s:BruiseFireRate}% fire rate per stack when shooting at a bruised enemy.
ability_slingshot_catapult_desc: Slingshots builds up power before launching himself forward as a large spinning ball, rolling around damaging enemies. Explodes on finish.
ability_slingshot_open_wounds_desc: Passive. Slingshot's bullets cause wounds to build up on the enemy, dealing a large burst of damage when enough hits are inflicted.
ability_slingshot_open_wounds_t3_desc: Damage burst sprays poisonous blood nearby, damaging any enemies staying in the area.
ability_slingshot_ultimate_desc: All nearby enemies are knocked in the air and stunned for as long as Slingshot channels.
ability_smelt_desc: Every time Heavy takes damage from a bullet it goes into his weapon clip and reduces ability cooldowns.
ability_smoke_bomb_desc: Fade out of sight, becoming invisible and gaining sprint speed. Attacking removes invisibility, but using items does not. Close enemies can see through your invisibility.
ability_smoke_bomb_t2_desc: After invis, gain +10% Bullet Lifesteal for 8s
ability_smoke_bomb_t3_desc: Enable Ability Charges and grants 0.5s of Invincibility
ability_speed_drone_desc:
Deploy a energy drone which helps you run faster, and reduces your windup and reload times.
Replaces any other drone.
ability_stacking_damage_desc: Shooting a target increases your bullet damage on that target. Gain one stack per bullet hit, two if the hit is a headshot.
ability_stacking_damage_quip: Deal increasing bullet damage to a target
ability_stacking_damage_t1_desc: 49.5 Spirit damage and 15% slow for 2s to target every 20 stacks
ability_stacking_damage_t2_desc: +40 Max Stacks and +5s Duration
ability_swan_acrobat_desc:
Gain stacking bonuses every time you dash, double jump, wall jump, or teleport.

Gaining new stacks refreshes the duration.
ability_swan_leap_desc: Leap in a target direction. If no direction is chosen, then leap straight up instead.
ability_target_practice_desc: On activate, your next gun hit selects an enemy Hero as a target. Shoot them {s:ShotsToProc} times to deal a burst of spirit damage. Every Headshot will increase the burst
ability_target_practice_quip: Focus shots on a target to gain an advantage
ability_target_practice_t3_desc: Your bullets reduce your target's Bullet Resist by {s:BulletArmorReduction}% for {s:DebuffDuration}s
ability_teammate_armor_buff_desc: Apply a temporary Bullet and Spirit barrier to a friendly unit or yourself.
ability_tempest_faraday_cage_desc: Target an enemy hero to trap them in a faraday cage, blocking movement and bullets.
ability_tempest_ion_dagger_desc: Tempest throws a dagger that damages the target and applies an ionizing charge to it for a duration. Tech damage dealt to that target is increased and a cleaves for a percentage of that damage to nearby targets. Ionizing a target multiple times increases the duration.
ability_tempest_tesla_coil_desc: Build a Tesla Coil that builds a charge on itself then discharges on the closest enemy within range. Holds the charge and builds overcharge if no enemies are in range. When Tempest fights in range of the coil, his gun is amp'd and his bullets deal bonus spirit damage.
ability_tempest_weathermaker_desc: A ray of sun shines on each enemy hero anywhere on the map. Moments later, any enemy that did not find cover is struck by a powerful bolt of lightning, dealing damage to them and revealing them through walls for a duration. Can pass through Faraday Cage.
ability_throw_sand_desc: Spray sand that disarms enemies in front of you and deals damage.
ability_throw_sand_quip: Disarm enemies in front of you
ability_throw_sand_t3_desc: Slow targets by -40% and reduces dash distances by -40%
ability_trapper_fear_desc:
Dealing Spirit Damage builds an increasing Slow. Once full, the buildup is consumed to apply an Immobilize and a burst of Spirit Damage.

This effect has a cooldown per target.
ability_trapper_poisonjar_desc: Throw a jar that leaves a spreading toxic pool. Enemies caught in the pool are Slowed and Silenced.
ability_trapper_poisonjar_t3_desc: -25% Spirit Resist for enemies in the pool
ability_trapper_spidershield_desc: Apply a Combat Barrier to a target ally and periodically deal Spirit Damage and Slows.
ability_trapper_spiderwave_desc:
Release a wave of spectral spiders that chase enemies and explode, dealing Spirit Damage.

Hit enemies are poisoned, temporarily losing Spirit and Spirit Resist. This effect can stack multiple times.
ability_trapper_spiderwave_quip: Release a wave of spectral spiders
ability_trapper_spiderwave_t2_desc: Additional -3 Spirit and -3% Spirit Resistance
ability_trapper_webwall_desc: Create a thread of web between two surfaces. Enemies who touch the web take Damage over time, become Slowed and are Revealed.
ability_trapper_webwall_t3_desc: +2s Debuff Duration. The Web also Silences for 2.5s
ability_uber_drone_desc: After a charge-up time, Heavy turns invulnerable
ability_uber_drone_t1_desc: While Ubered, infinite clip and no windup
ability_uber_drone_t3_desc: Gain +{s:RageOnUber} stacks of Heavy Rage
ability_ult_combo_desc: Hold the target in place, stunning them and dealing damage during the channel. If they die during, or within 3 seconds of Combo ending, you permanently gain max health.
ability_ult_combo_quip: Hold the enemy hero in place and pummel them
ability_ult_combo_t3_desc: +31.5 Damage Per Second and 80% lifesteal
ability_unicorn_dazzlingorb_desc:
Launch a deadly orb of light that deals {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDamage'} and applies {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'Slow'} and reduces Dash Distance on impact. The orb then bounces to the enemies within range. If no target is found, the orb will linger for a short duration while continuing to look for targets.

Prioritizes enemy heroes when picking targets. Refunds half the cooldown on a miss.
ability_unicorn_luminousstrike_desc:
Call down a beam of light from the sky. After a short duration, the beam will fully form, causing an explosion that deals {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDamage'} to all targets in the area.

Celeste will receive a stacking buff that increases her spirit damage anytime this hits an enemy hero.
ability_unicorn_prismaticguard_desc: Surround yourself in a protective prism that provides {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusMoveSpeed'}. If the barrier is destroyed, it silences nearby enemies and deals a portion of the barrier as damage.
ability_unicorn_prismaticguard_t2_desc: +100 Barrier and Increased Barrier Spirit Scaling
ability_unicorn_prismaticguard_t3_desc: +2 Silence Duration and -18 Cooldown. Allows Shining Wonder Bounce.
ability_unicorn_radiantblast_desc: Blast enemies in a cone in front of you with a flare of light. Enemies hit take {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDamage'} when attacked by Celeste and provides spirit lifesteal.
ability_upgrade_description: You have unlocked a tier {s:upgradeTier} ability upgrade. Choose an upgrade from the list below.
ability_upgrade_extra_info: Ability upgrades are unlocked whenever you purchase two upgrades in any mod tier (Weapon, Armor, Tech or Utility).
ability_vampirebat_batblink_desc:
Briefly disperse, becoming untargetable and flying to a target location.

Can be recast within a brief window.
ability_vampirebat_batblink_t2_desc: On Cast: Gain +25% Fire Rate & add 8 bullets
ability_vampirebat_batswarm_desc:
Active: Unleash a cloud of bats that seek out targets, each dealing {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDamage'} and applying {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'Silence'}.

Passive: Triggering Love Bites against heroes permanently increases the number of bats released.
ability_vampirebat_batswarm_t3_desc: On Hit: Deal +1% Current Health as Damage
ability_vampirebat_doubledagger_desc:
Throw two consecutive daggers, dealing {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDamage'}.

If both daggers hit the same target, deal {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusSpiritDamage'} instead.
ability_vampirebat_doubledagger_t3_desc: On Double Hit: Reduce Spirit Resist by {s:TechArmorDamageReduction}% for {s:DebuffDuration}s
ability_vampirebat_lovebites_desc:
Bullets and abilities apply {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDamage'}, building up to a burst of {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusSpiritDamage'}.

Love Bites has a unique cooldown per target.
ability_vampirebat_lovebites_t1_desc: On Proc: +4.064 m/s Move Speed for 3s
ability_vampirebat_lovebites_t3_desc: On Proc: -1 Stamina and 30% Slow for 3s
ability_vampirebat_steallife_desc:
Active: Slash with your umbrella, dealing {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDamage'}, increasing with their missing health. Receive a {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'Heal'} for every target killed.

Passive: Holding {g:citadel_binding:'ADS'} causes you to briefly float.
ability_vampirebat_steallife_t2_desc: +54 Damage and improved Heal Per Kill scaling
ability_viper_debuffdagger_desc:
Throw a dagger, dealing {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDamage'} and applying {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'Slow'}.

Every subsequent dagger against the same target stacks in {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDamage'} and {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'Slow'}.
ability_viper_debuffdagger_t2_desc: On Hit: -8% Bullet Resist and -5% Bullet Resist per Stack
ability_viper_debuffdagger_t3_desc: On Hit: Refund 55% Charge Cooldown
ability_viper_hookdagger_desc: Throw a blade, dealing Spirit Damage. The blade then hooks back, applying Spirit Damage again and applying a Slow.
ability_viper_hookdagger_quip: Throw a blade that returns to you
ability_viper_petrifybola_desc:
Throw an explosive bola. On exploding, the bola Slows and Damages all enemies in the area.

Direct hits deal Additional Damage and Petrify instead. Petrified units block all damage, but cannot take actions.
ability_viper_petrifybola_t3_desc: +1s Petrify Duration. Petrifies all enemies in the area.
ability_viper_snakedash_desc: You have increased Slide Distance, can Slide up hills, and can turn faster while Sliding.
ability_viper_snakedash_quip: Increase the agility of your Slide
ability_viper_snakedash_t3_desc: On Slide: Gain 180 barrier for 5s
ability_viper_ult_desc: Create a hexed area on the ground. After a delay, ALL units in the cylindrical area are Petrified. Enemies also suffer Spirit Damage. Petrified units block all damage, but cannot take actions.
ability_viper_ult_quip: Turn both allies and enemies into stone
ability_viper_venom_desc:
Inject a target with lethal venom. After a delay the venom triggers, dealing Spirit Damage. The damage is increased by the target's missing health.

Lethal Venom will ignore Petrify's damage block.
ability_viper_venom_quip: Inject your enemies with a deadly venom
ability_viper_venom_t2_desc: -40% Healing Reduction and -8s Cooldown
ability_viper_venom_t3_desc: Bullets also build up Lethal Venom
ability_warden_crowd_control_desc: Throw a flask that damages and reduces the weapon damage and move speed of enemies it hits.
ability_warden_crowd_control_t3_desc: -6.5s Cooldown and Weapon Debuff applies -30% Fire Rate
ability_warden_high_alert_desc: Gain a Barrier and bonus move speed.
ability_warden_high_alert_quip: Gain a Barrier and move speed
ability_warden_high_alert_t3_desc: +150 Barrier Health and now scales with Spirit Power
ability_warden_lock_down_desc: Curse an enemy hero. If they don't move away from their initial position within the escape time, they will be damaged and immobilized.
ability_warden_lock_down_quip: Curse your target, rooting them if they don't escape
ability_warden_lock_down_t3_desc: Warden deals +20% more Bullet Damage to trapped Heroes for 6s
ability_warden_riot_protocol_desc:
After charging for 2s, release pulses that damage enemies and heal you based on the damage done.
While channeling Last Stand you have greatly increased bullet and spirit resist.
ability_warden_riot_protocol_quip: Emit pulses that steal health from enemies
ability_werewolf_cripplingslash_desc: Smash enemies around you, dealing {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDamage'}. They suffer from disarm and a brief {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'Slow'}.
ability_werewolf_frenzy_desc: Deal {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'MeleeDamage'} to all enemies in front of you, receiving a {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'Heal'} for a portion of the damage dealt. The damage is increased the lower health they have.
ability_werewolf_kickflip_desc_1: Dash forward and kick the first enemy hit, dealing {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'MeleeDamage'} while pushing yourself off and marking them.
ability_werewolf_kickflip_desc_2: Shooting the marked target deals {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDamage'} and removes the mark.
ability_werewolf_kickflip_t2_desc: On Hero Hit: Restore 2 Stamina
ability_werewolf_kickflip_t3_desc: +80 Bonus Damage and kicked enemies deal -35% Damage for 5s
ability_werewolf_leap_desc: Leap through the air before landing, dealing {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'MeleeDamage'} and applying {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'Slow'} to nearby enemies while pushing them away.
ability_werewolf_leap_t1_desc: On Landing: +{s:BonusMoveSpeed} m/s Move Speed for {s:LandingBonusesDuration}s
ability_werewolf_maulingleap_desc: Leap forward, mauling the first enemy hit for {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'MeleeDamage'}. They suffer from reduced {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BulletResist'} and take {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDamage'} over time.
ability_werewolf_netshot_desc: Throw a bola, dealing {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDamage'}, applying {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'Slow'} and preventing movement abilities, stamina, or jumping.
ability_werewolf_netshot_t3_desc: -5s Ability Cooldown. Bola ricochets to 2 additional targets
ability_werewolf_onthehunt_desc: Gain {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusFireRate'} and {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusMoveSpeed'}, half to nearby allies. Kills during this time recasts On The Hunt.
ability_werewolf_passive_desc:
Human:Track the last hero you hit. Killing tracked enemies grants bonus souls.

Werewolf:Track any low-health heroes nearby. Killing tracked heroes reduce your cooldowns.
ability_werewolf_transformation_desc:
Passive: Dealing damage generates bloodlust, increased at low health. At max bloodlust, you automatically cast Lycan Curse.

Active: Instantly transform, gaining increased {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'MaxHealth'}, {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'MoveSpeed'}, and stacking {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'FireRate'} on enemy heroes, and replacing your abilities and weapon with their ferocious versions.
ability_werewolf_transformation_t2_desc: +3 m/s Move Speed and 125 Bonus Health
ability_werewolf_transformation_t3_desc: On Hero Kill: Refresh abilities, duration, and transformation heal
ability_werewolf_transformation_trigger_: Return back to your human form.
ability_werewolf_unloadgun_desc: Instantly reload your gun. You gain {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusFireRate'} and deal bonus {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'WeaponDamage'} based on the target's health for a limited number of shots, but suffer from reduced accuracy.
ability_werewolf_unloadgun_t3_desc: If you hit all shots, deal +8% current health as damage
ability_wrecker_salvage_desc: Latches onto an Enemy, damaging them and healing yourself while attached. Targets must be in line of sight and within max range to stay latched. A successful kill also restores a Bio Blast charge.
ability_wrecker_salvage_quip: Consume an enemy trooper or neutral
ability_wrecker_teleport_desc: Launch a flying shadow copy of yourself that you control, teleporting your original body to wherever it lands. The teleport explosion slows enemies and deals damage based on how long you were flying.
ability_wrecker_teleport_quip: Launch a flying illusion of yourself, teleporting your real body where the illusion lands
ability_wrecker_ultimate_desc: Grabs any enemy looked at by Wrecker, putting them in stasis and holding them overhead. Stuns, and damages all captured enemies when finished. Any grabbed NPCs are salvaged.
ability_wrecking_ball_desc: Create a large ball of scrap that can be thrown, damaging and stunning the first enemy hit. The ball takes time to create and you move slower while carrying it.
ability_wrecking_ball_quip: Throw a ball of scrap that stuns enemies
akimbo_bulletshield_desc:
Creates a shield that protects {s:hero_name} from bullets and prevents bullet based procs. Bullet shield explodes when it expires.
Prevents
akimbo_chargedshot_desc: {s:hero_name} charges gun and deals Spirit Damage to nearby enemies in front.
akimbo_chargedshot_t3_desc: Reduces enemy bullet armor by {s:BulletArmorReduction} for {s:BulletArmorReductionDuration}s
akimbo_rocketman_desc: {s:hero_name} transforms into a grenade that stuns enemies.
akimbo_stealammo_desc: Force targets to reload. {s:hero_name} gains {s:StealTechPower}% Spirit Power per target.
apocalypse_armageddon_desc: A pool of light marks a safe zone surrounding {s:hero_name} as meteors fall from the sky in a wide radius around the safe zone. Meteors damage allies as well as enemies, but damage to allies is reduced and non-lethal.
apocalypse_discharge_soul_desc: Fires a projectile that damages, EMPs, and slows. Charges do not refresh with time. Collect charges by kneeling next to tombstones that appear near fallen friendly troopers.
apocalypse_four_horsemen_desc: Summon four hologram horsemen who stampede in a straight line, damaging enemies they pass through and leaving a trail that slows and damages enemies.
apocalypse_gigantic_sword_desc: {s:hero_name}'s staff turns into a gigantic sword. When active, Apocalypse's melee attack deal extra damage and cover extra range.
cadence_ability_anthem_desc: Burst into an inspiring song! You and any ally that comes within range get an instant reload with an extra large clip, and have a Fire Rate bonus that increases until the song ends.
cadence_ability_anthem_quip: Lead the charge, inspiring allies in earshot and giving them weapon buffs
cadence_ability_crescendo_desc: Encase nearby enemies in glass in an increasing range over a short duration. Cadence then breaks the glass with her powerful voice, breaking any shields on the them, damaging them, and giving them massive bullet vulnerability for a duraiton after.
cadence_ability_crescendo_quip: Encase enemies in glass then shatter it
cadence_ability_grandfinale_desc: Build high ground undernearth Cadence. Allies fighting from the high ground get a fire rate bonus and explosive bullets.
cadence_ability_grandfinale_quip: Build a stage, then fight from it with weapon buffs.
cadence_ability_lullaby_desc: Lull your foes to sleep! Any enemy that comes in range of Cadence sleeps until woken by damage, Cadence goes out of range, or the song ends. Cadence has bonus regeneration while singing.
cadence_ability_lullaby_quip: Lull any foe you come within earshot of to sleep.
cadence_ability_silencecontraptions_desc: Disarm yourself perform a long-range dash melee attack. For the duration of the song, you remain disarmed and your melee abilities apply a debuff that disarms and EMP's enemy targets.
cadence_ability_silencecontraptions_quip: Start a melee brawl. No guns allowed.
ccitadel_settings_alt_cast_hold_time_too: Set the duration for which the ability button must be held in order to trigger an alternate cast.
citadel_ability_ballista_ammo_pack_desc:
Equips an ammo backpack, allowing rapid fire of heavy ballistic shells. Slows the user somewhat.

This can be cancelled by toggling off. Remaining shells will be lost.
citadel_ability_ballista_bullet_storm_de: Fires a shell into the air which explodes into a rain of shrapnel. Deals damage over time and slows.
citadel_ability_ballista_fusion_bomb_des: Plants a fused bomb that deals light damage every second, until it explodes after {s:Fuse}.
citadel_ability_ballista_mine_field_desc: Places a clister of proximity mines around the target area. Mines deal damage and slow their victims
citadel_ability_ballista_shell_shotgun_d:
Ballista wields a massive flak cannon, dealing damage and knocking back enemies in front of her.

Deals weapon damage
citadel_ability_bebop_laser_beam_desc: Channel a powerful torrent of energy that deals {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDamage'} and applies {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'Slow'}.
citadel_ability_bebop_laser_beam_t3_desc: Hyper Beam heals None for 65% of its damage on Heroes. 20% on non-hero
citadel_ability_bull_charge_desc:
Charge forward, {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'Pulling'} enemies you hit. Pushing a hero into a wall applies {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'Stun'}.
If you collide with a hero you move faster during your charge.
citadel_ability_bull_charge_quip: Charge into the fray, dragging enemies along
citadel_ability_bull_charge_t1_desc: On Hero Collide: +2.2 Weapon Damage for 8s
citadel_ability_bull_charge_t2_desc: On Wall Hit: +0.45s Stun Duration
citadel_ability_bull_heal_desc: Drain health from nearby enemies in front of you, dealing {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDPS'} and {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'Healing'} for a portion of the damage dealt.
citadel_ability_bull_heal_quip: Drain health from nearby enemies in front of you
citadel_ability_bull_heal_t3_desc: +20s DPS and Improved damage scaling
citadel_ability_bull_leap_desc: Leap high into the air before crashing into the ground, dealing {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDamage'} and applying {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'Stun'}.
citadel_ability_bull_leap_quip: Smash into enemies from above, stunning them
citadel_ability_bull_leap_t2_desc: On Hero Hit: +100 Max HP and +14% Fire Rate
citadel_ability_card_toss_desc: Deal weapon damage to summon cards.  Activate to throw a card that flies towards the enemy or point under your crosshair.
citadel_ability_card_toss_t3_desc: +50% Card Summon Rate and Cards apply a 30% Slow for 1s.
citadel_ability_chain_lightning_t3_desc: Chain lightning can hit any enemies around the target.
citadel_ability_charged_tackle_desc: Build up power then enter a charge, dragging and damaging enemies in your path. Can be canceled early.
citadel_ability_charged_tackle_t2_desc: Gain a {s:TechShield}HP Spirit Shield for {s:TechShieldDuration}s when Charged Tackle ends.
citadel_ability_charged_tackle_t3_desc: Remove Prepare Time and {s:AbilityCooldown}s Ability Cooldown
citadel_ability_chrono_kinetic_carbine_d:
Charge up a powerful shot of time energy, dealing {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDamage'} and applying a Time-Stop to enemies hit. The damage dealt increases with {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'WeaponDamage'}. Move speed is increased while charging.

While in the air and charging, {g:citadel_binding:'ADS'} to timeslow your movement.
citadel_ability_chrono_kinetic_carbine_q: Charge up your weapon to deal high damage and timestop
citadel_ability_chrono_pulse_grenade_des: Throw a grenade that begins pulsing when it lands. Each pulse applies damage, movement slow, and stacking damage amplification for Gunslinger against the victim.
citadel_ability_chrono_pulse_grenade_qui: Throw a grenade that pulses, dealing damage and slow
citadel_ability_chrono_pulse_grenade_t3_: +36 Pulse Damage and +0.75m Radius per pulse.
citadel_ability_chrono_sphere_desc: {s:hero_name} creates a Time Vortex that slows down the flow of time for enemies. Enemies are also Silenced while in the Vortex.
citadel_ability_chrono_sphere_t3_desc: On creation, the Time Vortex will pull all enemies in to its center.
citadel_ability_chrono_swap_desc: Fire a projectile that swaps your position with the target enemy hero. While the effect occurs, you gain spirit lifesteal and the enemy takes damage over time.
citadel_ability_chrono_swap_quip: Swap positions with an enemy hero.
citadel_ability_chrono_time_wall_desc: Create a time warping wall that stops time for all enemy projectiles and bullets that touch it. Enemies that touch the wall will be briefly slowed.
citadel_ability_chrono_time_wall_quip: Create a wall that greatly slows projectiles
citadel_ability_chrono_time_wall_t2_desc: +9% Max Health Damage on Touch
citadel_ability_chrono_time_wall_t3_desc: Enemies that touch Time Wall will be Silenced for 2.5s
citadel_ability_converge_desc: Throw a grenade that quckly pulls enemies toward its center.
citadel_ability_defensive_fortress_desc: Summon a large defensive shield that blocks enemy bullets but lets you and your teammate shoot through it.
citadel_ability_drone_detecting_enemies_: Outlines all enemy players (including hidden enemies) infront of where the drone is currently looking at.
citadel_ability_drone_teleport_desc: Instant Cast: teleports Hijack below the drone after the cast delay.
citadel_ability_duo_arc_cannon_desc: Duo's drone sweeps its laser {s:SweepCount} times from the sky, dealing damage to anyone caught in its path.
citadel_ability_duo_arc_cannon_t1_desc: Burns ground, dealing {s:BurnDPS} dps for {s:BurnDuration}s
citadel_ability_duo_energy_link_desc:
A short range tether which heals your drone. Breaks if you walk out of range.

If targeting an enemy, deals damage instead.
citadel_ability_duo_energy_link_t3_desc: Applies damage and healing effects within {s:ZapDistance}m of target
citadel_ability_duo_fusion_scalpel_desc: Forms a link between you and your drone, dealing damage to enemies which touch it
citadel_ability_duo_fusion_scalpel_t3_de: Link with up to {s:MaxAllyLinks} nearby allies
citadel_ability_duo_grenade_desc: Throw a grenade that explodes after {s:ArmingDuration}s
citadel_ability_duo_order_attack_desc: Orders your drone to attack a specific target. It will chase the target as needed to shoot the target
citadel_ability_duo_order_follow_desc: Orders your drone to follow you. It will automatically attack anyone who shoots you, or anyone you shoot.
citadel_ability_duo_order_sentry_desc: Orders your drone to guard an area. It will automatically attack any nearby threats
citadel_ability_duo_summon_drone_t2_desc: Fire a barrage of rockets while in sentry mode
citadel_ability_duo_summon_drone_t3_desc: Immobilize targets in place in attack mode
citadel_ability_fissure_wall_desc:
Creates a wall that divides the terrain in half. On creation, the wall deals damage and applies slow to enemies nearby.
After casting, press{g:citadel_binding:'Attack'}or{g:citadel_binding:'Ability3'}to erupt the wall early.
citadel_ability_fissure_wall_quip: Conjure a wall to block your foes
citadel_ability_fissure_wall_t1_desc: Removes 1 stamina and amplifies McGinnis's damage by 15% on hit enemies for 7s
citadel_ability_fissure_wall_t3_desc: Adds a 0.75s Stun to enemies hit by Spectral Wall
citadel_ability_flying_strike_desc: Throw a grappling hook to reel yourself towards an enemy, damaging and slowing the target when you arrive.
citadel_ability_flying_strike_t3_desc: Can Grapple to ally Heroes and +6 Weapon Damage for 10s
citadel_ability_grapplehook_desc: Launches out a hook, and pull {s:hero_name} towards the wall it hits.
citadel_ability_healing_slash_desc: Slash enemies in front of you, damaging them and slowing their fire rate. If any enemy heroes are hit, you heal.
citadel_ability_healing_slash_quip: Damage enemies nearby, healing on hit
citadel_ability_hijack_mind_control_desc: Changes the team of enemy NPC's in an area and gives them extra health and bonus weapon damage. {s:hero_name} and nearby allies gain half the gold bounty for each hacked unit.
citadel_ability_hijack_mind_control_t1_d: Hacked units deal an extra {s:UnitBonusDamagePercent}% damage
citadel_ability_hijack_mind_control_t3_2: Hacked units deal an extra {s:UnitBonusDamagePercent}% damage
citadel_ability_hijack_stacking_weapon_j: Your bullets charge up a Weapon Jammer on enemy heroes that will give them a percent chance to misfire (bullet does not fire and they damage themselves).
citadel_ability_hook_desc:
Launch out a mechanical hand that {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'Pulls'} the first character it hits, reeling them in.

Grapple Arm can be used on allies.
citadel_ability_hook_quip: Pull in a target to you
citadel_ability_hook_t1_desc: +20% weapon damage against victims for 6s
citadel_ability_hornet_chain_desc: Throw a stake that tethers enemies to the location where the stake lands. Enemy movement is restricted to the length of the tether.
citadel_ability_hornet_chain_quip: Tether your enemies to the ground
citadel_ability_hornet_chain_t3_desc: +0.5s Tether Duration and +1m Capture Radius
citadel_ability_hornet_crit_stacking_buf: Landing a headshot temporarily increases your weapon damage, stacking up to {s:MaxStacks} times.
citadel_ability_hornet_crit_vulernabilit: Your shots have a chance to leave targets vulnerable, causing all bullets to crit them.  Headshots are guaranteed to apply this effect.
citadel_ability_hornet_explosive_headsho: Headshots you deal explode, dealing a percent of the damage to nearby enemies.
citadel_ability_hornet_leap_desc: Leap into the air and fly. While in flight your weapon deals bonus spirit damage.
citadel_ability_hornet_leap_quip: Take flight and empower your weapon
citadel_ability_hornet_mark_desc: Vindicta mark's an enemy. They are visible on the minimap for the duration, and Vindicta can detect them through walls.
citadel_ability_hornet_mark_t2_desc: When a marked enemy is killed, Vindicta immediately gains {s:ChargeForKill} Charge for Assassinate
citadel_ability_hornet_nest_desc: Deploys a nest which will deploy Vindicta drones that fly slowly forward, attacking all enemies.
citadel_ability_hornet_snipe_desc: Use your scoped rifle to fire a powerful shot over long distances. Deal only partial damage until fully charged after 1s of being scoped. Does bonus damage to enemies with less than 50% health remaining. Landing a killing blow on a player with Assassinate grants you bonus weapon damage.
citadel_ability_hornet_snipe_quip: Snipe injured targets for massive damage
citadel_ability_hornet_sting_desc: Your crow familiar deals impact damage, reduces their bullet resist and applies a bleed that deals damage based on the target's current health.
citadel_ability_hornet_sting_quip: Make a target bleed over time
citadel_ability_hornet_sting_t1_desc: Crow Ricochets up to 2 times towards other enemies within 15m
citadel_ability_infinity_slash_desc:
Become infused with Yamato's shadow soul. After an initial invincible transformation your abilities are refreshed and are 60% faster. You gain immunity to negative status effects and have greatly increased bullet and spirit resist.
When you get a hero kill, you heal and the duration is extended.
citadel_ability_kali_disruptive_charge_d: Provides a large speed bonus to you and nearby allies. The speed bonus decays over time.
citadel_ability_kali_disruptive_charge_q: You and nearby allies move much faster
citadel_ability_kali_disruptive_charge_t: {s:LifestealPercent}% Damage Lifesteal for the duration of Pack Hunter
citadel_ability_kali_spinning_blade_desc: Throw a spinning blade that deals damage and returns to you.
citadel_ability_kali_spinning_blade_quip: Launch a boomerang that flies back
citadel_ability_kali_spinning_blade_t1_d: {s:SlowPercent}% slow for {s:SlowDuration}s on enemies hit
citadel_ability_kali_spinning_blade_t2_d: +{s:Damage} Damage and Occilioblade gains +100% more damage from spirit
citadel_ability_kali_spinning_blade_t3_d: {s:CooldownReductionOnHit}s Cooldown for each enemy hit by Occilioblade
citadel_ability_lash_desc: Pull yourself through the air toward a target. Using Grapple also resets your limit of air jumps and dashes.
citadel_ability_lash_down_strike_desc: Stomp the ground beneath you, damaging enemies in front of you. If you perform Ground Strike while airborne, you quickly dive towards the ground. Damage grows slower after 25m.
citadel_ability_lash_down_strike_quip: Slam down to the ground, damaging enemies
citadel_ability_lash_down_strike_t2_desc: Struck enemies are knocked up and slowed by 50% for 3s
citadel_ability_lash_down_strike_t3_desc: Damage Per Meter +110% and improved scaling
citadel_ability_lash_high_explosive_desc: Lash starts charging his grenade; the longer the grenade is held before being thrown, the more damage it does. Press the button again to throw it a short distance in front of Lash, exploding on contact.
citadel_ability_lash_quip: Use your whip to pull yourself to an enemy
citadel_ability_lash_t2_desc: +20m Cast Range and gain +6 Weapon Damage for 10s
citadel_ability_lash_t3_desc: +20% Fire Rate to Weapon Bonus Buff
citadel_ability_lash_ultimate_desc:
Focus on enemies to connect whips to them. After channeling, connected enemies are lifted and stunned then slammed into the ground. Your victims and any enemies in the landing zone will be damaged and slowed.
Press{g:citadel_binding:'Attack'}to throw connected enemies early. Enemies that are not in line of sight or go out of range during the latch time will not be grabbed.
