Or hide in plain sight at a Coney Island Side Show where most folk would assume her appearance was just part of an act?

Over the years "The Dazzling Celeste" has grown into one of the more popular attractions on Coney, and while the applause from a cheering audience is appreciated; what keeps her waking up in the morning is the found family she's made at work.

Keruba the Mermaid.

Blockhead Lenny.

Chickenwing.

Ted.

These were her people. So when she discovered that one of her own sold part of their soul in order to cover a gambling debt, Celeste knew it was time to step out of the shadows and do whatever it takes to get it back. Is revealing her power to The Patrons a risk? Yes. But that's tomorrow's problem... her family needs help today.
hero_vampirebat_lore:
Mina Ha had it all...rich parents, elite education, and an arranged marriage that would see her ascend from run-of-the-mill upper class to American royalty. She was happy.

Then her betrothed was assassinated.

Mina wept; not for the life of her fianc, but for the future that was stolen from her. Why couldnt the killer just wait until after the wedding? Then shed have the last name she always dreamed of and no one would even have to pretend to love anyone. It could have been perfect, but life wasnt fair...and so Mina did what she always does when things dont go her way: she told her parents to fix it.

Mr. And Mrs. Ha knew that the only way to appease their daughter was to offer her something greater than what she lost... and marrying into one of the worlds most lauded families was a tall order to top. They had to think big. They had to think outside of the box. They had to promise their daughter immortality.

It took a small fortune, but eventually they found a vampire who was willing to turn her. Unsurprisingly, Mina thought the idea of eternal youth and a trust fund was an acceptable plan B and happily agreed to the proposal. Now a fledgling vampire, Mina is quickly discovering that the clout she held as a human has no weight in vampire high society...and while at first that annoyed her, if there is one thing Mina has a knack for, it's learning the rules so she can subvert them. She will be the Viscount of New York, the other vampires just don't know it yet.
hero_viper_lore:
When it comes to breaking the law, not getting caught is a pretty important part of the job. Vyper never got that memo. Luckily for her, if theres one thing shes better at than being arrested, its escaping out of jail.

Having done time in every major prison in the tri-state area, Vyper has built an impressive network of street level lowlifes that owe her one. Shes also built an impressive network of street level lowlifes that want her dead, but she tries to focus on the positive.
hero_viper_playstyle: With a powerful weapon (and deadly venom to match), Vyper can slither into the back of teams and assassinate high-priority targets in a storm of bullets.
hero_viscous_lore:
The Bermuda Triangle was never a myth, it was a shadowline nexus deep underneath the Atlantic Ocean. For the most part, the things that escaped this astral gate were benign (like Nessie), but now something dark and predatory known only as The Adversary hunts the seas... and ocean denizens are scared to death.

One of those inhabitants, a psychic sea anemone, wants to do something about it. Summoning an ectoplasmic goo body to traverse the surface, Viscous is desperately trying to summon the Patrons in order to keep The Deep safe from the horror that lurks below.
hero_viscous_playstyle: Viscous vexes his opponents through clever evasion and strategic uses of healing, enabling him to withstand the most brutal of enemy attacks.
hero_warden_lore:
Most people think the supernatural came into the world 50 years ago. Theyre wrong. Its presence shaped folklore for generations and as long as there have been people afraid of the shadows, there have been those who dedicated their lives to fighting in them.

Coming from a lineage of militant alchemists, Wardens family always trained for the day they would have to stave off a mystic apocalypse but as time passed the importance of the lessons seemed less and less important. What once was viewed as a sincere warning slowly morphed into being perceived as amusing anecdotes told by their superstitious grandparents.

When the portal opened in Central Park, Wardens parents realized not only was everything they were told was true, they were unprepared. Refusing to let the next generation fall asleep on the job, Warden was trained since birth to be a supernatural killing machine with one purpose: stopping the Patrons from ever entering our world.
hero_warden_playstyle: Warden leads from the front, jumping into the fray and hindering his opponents' ability to fight effectively. But what Warden considers brave, others consider reckless, and if he's not careful he can easily find himself in over his head.
hero_warden_role: Weakens his enemies and chases them down
hero_werewolf_lore: Lilah Silver is a mess.  She drinks too much, she smokes too much, and the less is said about her personal life the better.   But despite Silver's flaws she has managed to carve out a career as a successful bounty hunter, and while she would like to think that her successes are solely because she has incredible intuition, the fact that shes a werewolf doesnt hurt.
hero_wraith_lore: The cornerstone of the New York gambling scene, Wraith's organization is about as open a secret as it comes.  However, thanks to a non-trivial amount of bribes, shakedowns, and blackmail, Wraith knows that she's above the law.
hero_wraith_playstyle: Excelling at one-on-one combat, Wraith isolates targets, eliminating them with ruthless efficiency. Then teleporting away before anyone can retaliate.
hero_wrecker_lore:
When the Maelstrom first hit New York, it didnt just usher in a new age of mysticism to the world it changed geopolitics. From CIA employed seers identifying threats decades before they rise to power to occult pacts made in smoky backrooms; countless wars and atrocities have been prevented that would otherwise have shaped history. But that doesnt mean there is no war just that war has changed.

Paranormal Military Companies have risen to prominence. These groups, using a combination of extra-planar creatures and various blood magics; have found ways to circumvent the guardrails established by the nations watchdog oracles, allowing them to function as proxies for nations seeking to wage war.

Wrecker is one such soldier.

Employed by Eldritch Tactical Solutions (a subsidiary of Fairfax Industries), Wrecker is an elite soldier of fortune with a reputation for doing dirty work that other PMCs dont have the stomach for.
hero_wrecker_playstyle: Salvaging and scrapping for parts, Wrecker can disassemble troopers, crush foes with his Wrecking Ball, and capture all enemies in his Stasis Trap.
hero_yamato_playstyle: Yamato uses precise strikes to decimate her rivals. However, such damaging attacks often will leave her exposed, so she needs to make every shot count.
menu_play_botmatchmaking_desc: Play against Bots privately or alongside other players
menu_play_bots_easy_desc: Play a private match against bots
menu_play_browse_shop_desc: Browse all items in the shop and get ready for your next match!
menu_play_custom_game_desc: Create or join a custom match for up to 12 players
menu_play_explore_map_desc: Run around an empty city to test movement and navigation.
menu_play_get_started_desc: A helpful breakdown of the game's Objectives and Controls.
menu_play_hero_labs_locked_desc: Help test experimental new Heroes. Unlocked after 50 games played
menu_play_lane_training_desc: Learn the early game with a friendly hero to guide the way.
menu_play_learn_to_play_desc: Watch the tutorial then follow it up with some hero sandbox and lane training.

menu_play_matchmaking: Play a standard match against other players
menu_play_placement_matches_desc: Play your first few matches of Deadlock.
menu_play_ranked_desc: Play a more competitive match against similarly skilled players.
menu_play_sandbox_desc: Test Hero abilities, movement, and items
menu_ranked_unavailable_desc: You must play 50 Standard Games in order to queue for Ranked
mirage_fire_beetles_desc: Start launching fire scarabs. Each scarab can be launched separately, stealing max health from enemies over time and applying bullet resist reduction. Applying multiple scarabs to the same enemy will extend the health stealing duration. The health gain from hitting heroes is 3x as effective as against non-heroes.
mirage_fire_beetles_quip: Send out scarabs that steal life from enemies
mirage_sand_phantom_desc: Active: Consume multiplier of Djinn's Mark to deal its damage now.
mirage_sand_phantom_passive_desc: Passive: Your shots apply an increasing multiplier on the target. When the multiplier on a target expires or you reach the max, it's consumed and the target suffers Spirit Damage and is briefly revealed on the map. The final damage is the base damage times the multiplier.
mirage_sand_phantom_t1_desc: Apply 60% Slow for 0.5s whenever you apply 2x multiplier or higher
mirage_sand_phantom_t3_desc: -0.75s Cooldown Between Multiplier and +4 Max Multiplier
mirage_teleport_desc: Channeled. Target a friendly objective, ally or visible enemy hero on the minimap, then teleport to where they were when your channel started. After teleporting, you gain move speed as well as fire rate until your next reload.
mirage_teleport_quip: Teleport to an ally or enemy hero
mirage_teleport_t3_desc: On arrival, become Immune to Stun, Silence, Sleep, Root, and Disarm for 3s.
mirage_tornado_desc: Transform yourself into a tornado that travels forward, damaging enemies and lifting them up in the air. After emerging from the tornado you gain bullet evasion.
mirage_tornado_quip: Transform yourself into a tornado that lifts enemies
modifier_citadel_drone_spotted_enemy_des: The enemy can see your position
modifier_citadel_holding_golden_idol: Bring the Urn to an Altar
modifier_hint_vertical_movement: Press {g:citadel_binding:'Mantle'} to cancel. {g:citadel_binding:'Roll'}/ {g:citadel_binding:'Crouch'} to move Up/Down
operative_blindside_active_desc: Active: Throw a concussion grenade that reduces enemies' turn rate.
operative_blindside_passive_desc: Passive: Deal bonus damage with your gun and melee attacks when hitting an enemy in the back.
operative_revelation_desc: Activate your relic. Enemy heroes nearby have slowed movement and dashes, and receive damage over time when looking towards you. If enemies look at you long enough, they get cursed.
operative_scattercharge_desc: Spin your umbrella, launching numerous charges in a cone ahead of you. They detonate shortly after landing on the ground.
operative_umbrella_maneuver_desc: Use your umbrella to catch a gust of wind that lifts you backwards. You then charge up your umbrella to fire a projectile that explodes on impact.
rutger_cheat_death_desc: When taking otherwise fatal damage, Rutger becomes unkillable for 4s.
rutger_cheat_death_t2_desc: +{s:BonusMoveSpeed}% Bonus move speed when Cheat Death activates.
rutger_cheat_death_t3_desc: +{s:BulletLifestealPercent}% Bullet Lifesteal when Cheat Death activates.
rutger_force_field_desc: Create a field at target location that pushes enemies away from its outer edge.
rutger_pulse_desc:
Release a fast pulse in a large area that damages, slows, and prevents enemies from using abilities.
The damage dealt is based on how close the enemy is to the center of the pulse.
rutger_rocket_desc:
Launch a rocket that deals damage in an area and applies knockback.
Rutger receives 50% damage and 175% knockback from his own rocket if he's in its impact radius.
shifting_veil_bonus: Spirit Power, Speed, and Spirit Resist
slork_ability_4_desc: Slork creates a Jet of water that errupts from the ground damaging all nearby enemies and knocking them into the air.
slork_ability_invis_desc: Fade from view when not shooting or using abilities. When fully invisible, can be cast to deal {s:AmbushDamage} damage and +{s:StaminaDamage} stamina damage to enemies in front of Slork.
slork_chomp_desc: Dash forward and grab onto an enemy, biting them repeatedly. The enemy is slowed, disarmed, and silenced while grappled. When the target is below half health, deal an additional {s:DamagePercentHealth}% of their max health in damage.
slork_chomp_t3_desc: Chomp deals {s:DamageMissingPercentHealth}% of the enemies missing health each second.
slork_last_breath_desc: Encase yourself in a sphere of water that can absorb up to {s:DamageAbsorb} damage before bursting. When the sphere disipates for any reason enemies in range take {s:BurstDamage} damage.
slork_raging_current_desc: Call water from deep underground, saturating an area. Every {s:TargetAcquireTime}s a torrent will well up, tossing enemies into the air after a {s:TorrentDelay}s delay. Enemies will be stunned and their bullet armor reduced.
slork_riptide_desc: Summon a churning vortex of superheated water that burns enemies and lauches them towards Slork.
slork_scald_desc: Spray out an arc of superheated water that damages enemies over time.
synth_affliction_desc:
Deals damage and applies damage over time to all enemies nearby.
Affliction's damage is non-lethal and does not apply item procs.
synth_affliction_quip: Apply damage over time to enemies nearby
synth_affliction_t2_desc: +4s Duration and suppresses targets' healing by -40%
synth_barrage_desc:
Channel to start launching projectiles that deal damage and apply movement slow around their impact point. Each projectile landed on a hero grants you a stacking buff that amplifies all of your damage.
If you cast it while in the air, you'll float and maintain any horizontal momentum you started with.
synth_barrage_quip: Air glide while firing multiple projectiles
synth_barrage_t3_desc: +4% Amp Per Stack and 2m Radius
synth_blitz_desc: Gain fast firing rate and bullet lifesteal for a brief flurry of shots.
synth_blitz_quip: Your bullets fire faster and apply spirit amp
synth_blitz_t1_desc: Each Blitz shot amplifies your spirit damage against the target by {s:TechAmpPerBullet}% for {s:TechAmpLinger}s
synth_blitz_t3_desc: +{s:FastFireBullets} Fast Fire Shots and +{s:MaxStacks} Max Stacks
synth_dematerialize_desc: Alter your composition to become temporarily out of world, dealing damaging pulses to enemies nearby. Can be cancelled early.
synth_dematerialize_t3_desc: Dematerialize applies a stacking -15% Fire Rate to enemies on each damage interval. Lasts {s:FireRateSlowDuration}s.
synth_grasp_desc: Tether all nearby enemy heroes to you and gain Bullet Shield for each enemy hero tethered. You're immobilized for the duration.
synth_grasp_quip: Tether nearby enemy heroes to your position
synth_grasp_t3_desc: Damages and lifesteals {s:LifestealPerSecond}% of targets' max health per second
synth_plasma_flux_desc: Launch a sentient cloak that travels forward and damages enemies. You can press {g:citadel_binding:'Ability2'} to teleport to its location.
synth_plasma_flux_quip: Launch a damaging cloak that you can teleport to
synth_plasma_flux_t3_desc: +7 Weapon Damage for 10s after teleporting with Flying Cloak.
synth_pulse_desc: Escape into your suitcase. When the duration ends, deal damage to nearby enemies. Duration can be ended early by performing any action.
synth_pulse_quip: Briefly escape into your suitcase, then deal damage
synth_pulse_t3_desc:
Applies -35% Fire Rate for 4s.
+0.5s Escape Duration
team_msg_TheirTitanDefeated_Desc: Your team has defeated the enemy Patron
thumper_ability_1_desc: Thumper focuses a high power acoustic wave to reflect off of a hard surface. Blasting shards of material off in the reflected wave.
thumper_ability_2_desc: Rolls out a spike strip that damage enemies more the further they move through it.
thumper_ability_3_desc: Sends out a badger drone to harry an enemy and reveal it's position.
thumper_ability_4_desc: Blow enemies away with a high powered blast of air.
tokamak_breach_desc: Explosively decompress a cloud of coolant. Allies inside the cloud are invisible.
tokamak_breach_t1_desc: +{s:SlowPercent}% Movement Slow and -{s:BulletArmorReduction} Bullet Resist to enemies in smoke.
tokamak_breach_t2_desc: Purge Debuffs on Tokamak when cast.
tokamak_breach_t3_desc: Effects linger for {s:LingerAfterLeavingSmokeDurationPerHeat}s after leaving smoke.
tokamak_crimson_cannon_desc: Collect targets until ready to unload. Each shot is 0.6s apart.
tokamak_dying_star_desc: Launch forward damaging all enemies near where you land, knocking them into the air.
tokamak_heat_sinks_desc: Tokamak harnesses more power as they heat up. Tokamak's melee strikes add a {s:MeleeIgniteTime}s burn dealing {s:MeleeBurnDPS} Heat Power DPS.
tokamak_heat_sinks_t3_desc: +{s:BaseHeatPower} Base Heat Power, +{s:MaxHeatPower} Max Heat Power
tokamak_hot_shot_desc: Blast your enemies with a jet of superheated plasma. Deals additional damage when the heat guage is in the red. Triples heat dissipation while active.
tokamak_hot_shot_t3_desc:
+{s:NormalDPS} Normal DPS and +{s:NormalDPS_scale} Normal DPS Scale
+{s:HotDPS} Hot DPS and +{s:HotDPS_scale} Hot DPS Scale
tokamak_radiance_desc: Bring your core to the brink of criticality, blinding and damaging any that look in your direction. Damage increases when enemies look directly at you.
top_of_garage: {s:param_1} is on top of the garage
upgrade_ability_power_shard_active: Reset the cooldown of the imbued non-ultimate ability.
upgrade_ability_refresher_desc: Reset the cooldown of all your abilities and restore all your charges.
upgrade_ability_speed_desc: Increases your move speed while using any movement-based ability
upgrade_ablative_coat_desc: Provides Bullet Resist but you lose some each time you take Weapon Damage. Loss can only happen once every {s:StackLossFrequency}s. Bullet Resist is restored when out of combat.
upgrade_ablative_coat_innate: Increases your forward move speed over time. If Ablative Coat is reduced to 0 Bullet Resist, taking damage will reset the effect for 1.5s
upgrade_absorbing_armor_desc: Taking heavy hits of {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDamage'} from an enemy reduces a random ability cooldown.
upgrade_acolytes_glove_desc:
When you perform a Light or Heavy Melee attack against a hero, deal extra Spirit Damage with the attack and reduce the target's Spirit Resist.

Cooldown is {s:LightMeleeCooldownMult}x longer for Light Melee hits.
upgrade_active_bullet_shield_desc: Give temporary bullet shield for you and nearby allied Heros and their minions.
upgrade_active_reload_desc: While reloading, pressing {g:citadel_binding:'Reload'} during the highlighted portion will instantly finish your reload and grant you Fire Rate, Bullet Lifesteal and Move Speed.
upgrade_aerial_assault_active: Launch straight up high into the air. While in the air you will pause your aerial movement for {s:AssaultDuration}s. During this time you gain +{s:AssaultLifestealPercent}% bullet lifesteal, unlimited clip, +{s:AssaultFireRate}% fire rate, and bullets that explode in a {s:ExplodeRadius}m radius.
upgrade_aerial_supremacy_passive: Allows unlimited use of Air Jump or Air Dash before landing.
upgrade_ammo_scavenger_desc:
Any time you secure or deny a Soul from an entity you get ammo back and gain stacking Spirit Power.
At Max Stacks, gain bonus Sprint speed
upgrade_aoe_root_active: Throw a vacuum grenade, pulling all enemies into a small area and applying Slowing Hex.
upgrade_aoe_silence_desc: Throw a grenade that silences enemies and lowers their spirit resistance.
upgrade_aoe_smoke_bomb_desc:
Give you and teammates invisibility and a move speed bonus. Attacking or taking damage will remove the invisibility.
Cast delay: {s:AbilityCastDelay}s.
upgrade_aoe_tech_shield_desc: Temporarily gain spirit barrier for you and all nearby allied units.
upgrade_apex_combat_desc: Your bullets will ricochet on enemies near your target, applying any bullet procs and dealing a percentage of the original damage.
upgrade_aprounds_desc: Your Bullets have a chance to become unavoidable, piercing through enemies and ignoring their Bullet Resistance.
upgrade_arcane_eater_desc: Your bullets Steal Spirit Power from enemy Heroes. Steal {s:HeadshotBonusSteal} extra Spirit Power with Headshots. This effect stacks.
upgrade_arcane_extension_desc: Imbue an ability to increase its Duration.
upgrade_arcane_medallion_desc: Whenever you deal {s:MinimumDamage} Spirit damage or more in a single hit against an enemy hero, gain temporary Spirit Power.
upgrade_arcane_surge_desc: When you Dash-Jump the next ability you use will have bonus Range, Duration, and Spirit Power. Lasts up to {s:AbilityDuration}s.
upgrade_arctic_blast_desc: Release an expanding ice blast that deals Spirit Damage, Freezing and then Slowing targets it hits. Targets take increased damage while frozen.
upgrade_armor_reduction_debuff_desc: Your bullets reduce the target's bullet resistance by {s:ResistReduction}% of their current value for {s:AbilityDuration}s and deal bonus damage against bullet shields.
upgrade_banshee_slugs_headshots_desc: Landing a Headshot on Heroes will reduce their Bullet and Spirit Resist and applies Healing Reduction.
upgrade_belt_fed_magazine_desc: Your weapon gains a much larger magazine that requires spin-up time, starting with a slower initial fire rate and becoming faster over the spin-up time.
upgrade_berserker_desc: Your Weapon Damage increases as you take sustained damage.
upgrade_blood_tribute_desc: Toggle: Continually sacrifice Health to improve {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'FireRate'}, Debuff Resistance and Move Speed. Healing received is reduced during the sacrifice.
upgrade_boxing_glove_desc:
Your Melee Attack applies Movement Slow and heals you for a percentage of the Melee Damage dealt plus a fixed amount.

This heal is {s:NonHeroHealPct}% effective vs non-heroes.
Cooldown is {s:LightMeleeCooldownMult}x as long for Light Melee hits.
upgrade_bullet_armor_reduction_aura_desc: Reduces nearby enemies' Bullet Resist and Fire Rate. If there is only one enemy hero nearby, this effect is tripled.
upgrade_bullet_damage_reduction_aura_des: Reduces the Fire Rate of all nearby enemies.
upgrade_bullet_resist_shredder_desc: Reduces Bullet Resist on enemies when you deal Spirit Damage.
upgrade_bulletshredimbue_desc: Imbue an ability with increased range. Dealing damage with that ability grants you increased weapon damage per unique hero hit. Has reduced effect on non-heroes.
upgrade_burst_fire_actuator_desc: Your weapon fires an additional percentage of your gun's starting clip as a burst. If all bullets in a burst connect with an enemy Hero, gain temporary Base Bullet Damage for the rest of the clip.
upgrade_burst_fire_desc: Briefly gain Fire Rate and Move Speed when one of your bullets hits an enemy hero.
upgrade_camouflage_desc: Go invisible and maintain invisibility by not moving or attacking. Taking damage will not reveal the Hero. Bonus Regen while Invisible.
upgrade_capacitor_desc: Launch a projectile that deals {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritIcon'}damage, applies a strong slow that recovers over time, prevents Stamina usage and Silences their movement-based items and abilities.
upgrade_cardio_calibrator_desc: Reduces the effect of enemy Move Speed penalties.
upgrade_celestial_guidance_desc: Applies an extremely powerful cleanse that replenishes your allies globally.
upgrade_chain_lightning_desc: Your bullets have a chance to shock your target. The shock will jump to a nearby enemy.
upgrade_charge_mastery_passive: Charged abilities have {s:BonusChargedAbilityDamage}% increased damage and {s:BonusChargedCooldownReduction}% reduced cooldown.
upgrade_charmed_wraps_desc: Your abilities get their cooldowns reduced when you perform a heavy melee attack against a hero (or two light melee attacks within {s:LightMeleeTimeWindow}s).
upgrade_cheat_death_pulse_passive:
Releases a periodic pulse, damaging nearby enemies.
While death immune, the rate of the damage pulse is greatly increased.
upgrade_cheat_death_unkillable_passive:
When you would take lethal damage, instead become temporarily death immune and removes all non-stun debuffs.

While death immune, you deal reduced damage, have reduced healing and move slower.
upgrade_chonky_desc: After not taking damage for a period, gain health regen.
upgrade_chonky_high_health_passive_desc: When you are above {s:HealthThreshold}% health, you have bonus Move Speed.
upgrade_cloak_of_opportunity_desc: Block the next debuff that would apply movement lock, Stun, Chained, Immobilize, or Sleep and become Unstoppable. Also gain a Barrier and bonus {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'MoveSpeed'}
upgrade_cloaking_device_active_ambush_de: Attacking or using an ability will end your stealth and start an ambush, temporarily granting you bonus Fire Rate, Spirit Power and Melee Damage.
upgrade_cloaking_device_active_desc: Become Stealthed. Whenever you take damage while Stealthed you get briefly revealed.
upgrade_cloaking_device_desc: Become invisible. Nearby enemies will temporaily reveal the hero. Attacking or taking damage will remove the invisibility for {s:AbilityCooldown}s.
upgrade_close_quarter_combat_desc: When in close range to your target, gain Weapon Damage and your bullets apply a Movement Slow.
upgrade_close_range_desc: Deal additional Weapon Damage when in close range to your target.
upgrade_cold_front_desc: Release an expanding ice blast that deals Spirit Damage and Slows targets it hits.
upgrade_colossus_desc: Gain Bullet and Spirit Resist, and slow the move and dash speed of enemies nearby. Increases your model size.
upgrade_combo_breaker_desc:
Remove all debuffs and heal yourself.
Can be used while stunned.
upgrade_containment_desc:
Slows movement of enemy target. Also Silences their movement-based items and abilities.
Does not affect target's stamina usage.
upgrade_cooldown_reduction_desc: Reduces the Cooldown of your abilities.
upgrade_corpse_explosion_desc: Kills or assists cause an explosion where the victim dies. Kills against heroes have greater radius and damage.
upgrade_counterspell_desc: Your next parry protects you from the damage and effects of enemy abilities and items. On a successful spell parry {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'Heal'} and gain {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'MoveSpeed'} and {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'Spirit'}.
upgrade_crackshot_desc: Your next bullet deals bonus Spirit Damage.
upgrade_critshot_desc:
Your bullets have a chance to be empowered, causing them to deal bonus weapon damage on hit.
Bonus damage cannot Crit.
upgrade_crushing_fists_desc:
Your {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'MeleeDamage'} will restore ammo and apply a stacking bullet resist debuff on enemies. Heavy melee applies 2 stacks.

If the target reaches max stacks, they will be stunned.
upgrade_damage_recycler_desc: Reduces the effect of enemy applied healing reduction.
upgrade_debuff_absorb_desc: Shield against all spirit damage and debuffs.
upgrade_debuff_reducer_desc: Reduces the duration of all negative effects applied to you.
upgrade_deflecting_armor_desc: Gain a chance to either deflect incoming bullets, preventing all {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'WeaponDamage'} or prevent all on-hit effects from bullets.
upgrade_deflector_shield_desc: Adds bullet armor, and provides a shield that absorbs bullet damage. Shield regens out of combat (10s no damage).
upgrade_disarm_desc: Fires a projectile which reduces the Fire Rate of the target and steals Spirit.
upgrade_discord_desc:
Apply Spirit Resistance and an aura on a friendly target that deals {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritIcon'}damage to enemies proportional to their max health.
Can be self cast.
upgrade_divine_barrier_desc:
Remove all non-stun debuffs from the target and provide them with a Barrier and Move Speed.
Can be self-cast. Cooldown is reduced by half when cast on someone else.
upgrade_diviners_kevlar_desc: Upon casting an ultimate ability gain a Barrier and temporary Spirit Power.
upgrade_double_jump_desc: Allows you to perform an additional jump in mid-air.
upgrade_dps_aura_active_desc: Provides {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'MoveSpeed'} and {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'FireRate'} to you and nearby allies. Minions get double value.
upgrade_dps_aura_desc: Provides Bullet Resist to nearby friendly units.
upgrade_drum_magazine_desc: Provides a large ammo bonus, and increased reload speed
upgrade_duration_extender_desc: Increases Duration of your abilities and items by {s:NonImbuedBonusDuration}%.
upgrade_eldritch_shot_desc:
Your next bullet applies a powerful debuff reducing the enemy's damage output, healing and movement speed. It also deals {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusSpiritDamage'} based on the targets current Health.

The bullet is larger and penetrates through targets.
upgrade_electric_slippers_desc:
When sliding, evade bullets, gain fire rate and deal damage to enemies around you.

Cooldown is per target.
upgrade_enchanted_holsters_desc:
While in-combat whenever you cast an ability or item, gain a stacking buff that improves fire rate and reload speed.
Each stack refreshes the duration.
upgrade_escalating_exposure_desc: Dealing Spirit Damage applies a stacking Spirit Amp that increases your Spirit Damage to the target.
upgrade_eternal_gift_desc: Periodically gain a random permanent stat buff.
upgrade_eternal_gift_respawn_desc: Reduces your next death's respawn timer.
upgrade_ethereal_bullets_desc: Your imbued ability charges up over time with {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusSpiritDamage'}, {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusFireRate'}, and reloads bullets on use. Until your next reload, your bullets deal bonus Spirit Damage based on your Spirit Power.
upgrade_express_shot_desc: Your next attack will fire twice in quick succession with increased damage and velocity. This attack consumes extra ammo.
upgrade_extra_charge_desc: Adds one to your ability max charges.
upgrade_fervor_passive: While you are below {s:LowHealthThreshold}% health, you gain stat bonuses.
upgrade_fire_rate_aura_desc: Provides a Fire Rate increase to you and nearby teammates. Different bonus to non-Heroes
upgrade_fleetfoot_boots_active_desc: Gain bonus Move Speed and Slow Resistance.
upgrade_fleetfoot_boots_passive_desc: Removes the Move Speed penalty while shooting.
upgrade_focus_lens_desc: Target an enemy to Silence them. A portion of all damage dealt during the silence gets applied to the target when the silence wears off.
upgrade_frenzy_aura_desc:
Nearby enemies take increased damage from bullets.

If an enemy hero dies under this aura, you gain +{s:KillBonusMoveSpeedPerStack} m/s. This effect lasts until you die and can be stacked up to {s:MaxKillBonusMoveSpeedStack} times.
upgrade_frenzy_vampire_desc:
Your bullets heal you for a percentage of the damage they deal to enemies.

When an enemy is below {s:LowHealthPercentThreshold}% health you gain an additional {s:LowHealthLifeStealPercent}% Bullet Lifesteal against them.
upgrade_full_spectrum_passive: Adds bonus damage for every hero hit from your spirit damage mods or abilities and applies a movement slow.
upgrade_fury_trance_active: Grants Fire Rate and Spirit Resistance but Silences you and disables stamina usage and regeneration.
upgrade_galvanic_storm_passive1: Your bullets have a chance to shock your target. The shock will jump to a nearby enemy.
upgrade_galvanic_storm_passive2: When your spirit barrier is destroyed, you are empowered, granting {s:BuffDamageMult}x shock damage and increased move speed
upgrade_glass_cannon2_desc: Each hero kill grants permanent Weapon Damage (up to a max of {s:MaxStacks} times). Death results in the loss of 1 stack.
upgrade_glass_cannon_desc: Each hero kill grants permanent Fire Rate (up to a max of {s:MaxStacks} times). Death results in the loss of 1 stack.
upgrade_glitch_desc: Curses an enemy - interrupting, Silencing, Disarming, and preventing item usage. Removes all non-ultimate buffs.
upgrade_greater_withering_whip_desc: Disarms enemy target and reduces their Bullet Resist.
upgrade_guardian_ward_desc:
Provide the target with a Barrier and temporary Move Speed.
Can be self-cast.
Cooldown is reduced by half when cast on someone else.
upgrade_haunting_scream_desc: Launch an expanding projectile which Curses enemies for a short duration.
upgrade_headhunter_desc: Your next headshot against an enemy Hero deals {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusWeaponDamage'}, {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'Heal'} you, and briefly grants {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusMoveSpeed'}.
upgrade_headshot_booster2_desc: Landing a Headshot on Heroes reduces their Bullet Resist.
upgrade_headshot_booster_desc: Your next headshot against an enemy Hero deals {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusWeaponDamage'}.
upgrade_heal_on_level_desc: When you receive a Boon, automatically heal.
upgrade_healbane_desc: Your Spirit Damage applies Healing Reduction. If an enemy hero dies under this effect, you receive a large heal.
upgrade_healbuff_desc:
Applying {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'Heal'} to yourself or an ally grants the target {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusFireRate'} and {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusMoveSpeed'}.

Does not apply on innate Regen or passive Bullet/Spirit Lifesteals.
upgrade_healing_booster_desc: Increases the effectiveness of your healing.
upgrade_health_bullet_deflector_desc: Prevents {s:BulletDamageReductionPct}% of incoming bullet damage, with a maximum of {s:BulletDamageReductionPerSecond} damage deflected per second.
upgrade_health_regen_aura_desc:
Automatically provides a burst of healing to yourself and nearby friendlies every {s:HealInterval} seconds.
Effect does not stack.
upgrade_health_regenerative_armor_desc: Automatically restores health lost from bullet damage, regenerating up to {s:BulletDamageRecoveredPerSecond} health per second.
upgrade_health_stealing_magic_desc: Your spirit items and abilities heal you for a percentage of the damage they deal. Heals for less on Non-Heroes and does not work on buildings.
upgrade_health_stimpak_desc: Grant Regen and Sprint Speed to the target. Gets dispelled if you take damage from enemy players or objectives. Can be self-cast.
upgrade_height_advantage_desc: Gain additional {s:HighGroundBonusWeaponPower}% Weapon Damage when attacking targets that are below you.
upgrade_high_impact_armor_desc: Provides protection against high-damage bullets. Any bullet damage portion above the threshold is reduced by {s:DamageReduction}%.
upgrade_hollow_point_rounds_desc: When you are above {s:LifeThreshold}% health, deal additional Weapon Damage and your bullets reduce enemy Bullet Resist.
upgrade_hollow_point_rounds_shield_desc: Gain a Spirit Shield that blocks incoming Spirit Damage. The shield is restored when out of combat.
upgrade_icarus_wings_desc: When Airborne, You deal more damage and take reduced damage. Allows an additional use of Air Jump or Air Dash before landing.
upgrade_imbued_ability_passive1: Upon purchasing this mod, select an ability to imbue with {s:ImbuedBonusDuration}% bonus duration and {s:ImbuedBonusDamage}% bonus damage.
upgrade_imbued_ability_passive2: Your spirit damage slows your target's movement.
upgrade_imbued_duration_extender_desc: Increases the duration of your abilities and items.
upgrade_improved_bullet_armor_desc: When below {s:HealthThreshold}% health, gain additional Bullet Resist.
upgrade_infuser_desc: Gain Spirit Lifesteal and Spirit Power.
upgrade_inhibitor_desc: Your bullets build up to reduce the target's outgoing damage and apply healing reduction.
upgrade_intensifying_clip_desc: Increases Weapon Damage as you continuously fire your weapon.
upgrade_juggernaut_slow_desc: Enemies that shoot you have their Fire Rate slowed.
upgrade_kinetic_sash_desc: When you Dash-Jump you gain Fire Rate and bonus Ammo until your next reload. Lasts up to {s:AbilityDuration}s.
upgrade_leveler_active_desc: Applies a tether to the target and reduces the bullet resist of both you and them.
upgrade_leveler_passive_desc: Your headshot deals bonus damage and heavily slows enemy fire rate.
upgrade_lifestrike_gauntlets_desc:
Your next Melee attack heals you.

This heal is {s:NonHeroHealPct}% effective vs non-heroes.
Cooldown is {s:LightMeleeCooldownMult}x as long for Light Melee hits.
upgrade_long_range_desc: Deal additional Weapon Damage when beyond a minimum distance from your target.
upgrade_long_range_slowing_tech_desc: Applies a movement slow to enemies when dealing spirit damage.
upgrade_magic_burst_desc: Charges up over time with {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusSpiritDamage'}, causing abilities dealing more than {s:MinimumDamage} damage to deal additional damage.
upgrade_magic_carpet_desc:
Summon a Magic Carpet that will fly you away. While flying you are immune to slows and doing any action will dismiss the carpet.
Cannot use abilities while the carpet is being summoned.
upgrade_magic_clarity_desc: On ability or item use, gain a move speed bonus for {s:AbilityDuration}s. Your next ability cast will remove the move speed bonus and apply a Spirit bonus to that ability.
upgrade_magic_reach_desc: Imbue an ability to increase its range and effect radius.
upgrade_magic_shield_desc: While you are above {s:LifeThreshold}% health, gain bonus {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'Spirit'} and Cooldown Reduction.
upgrade_magic_shock_desc: Charges up over time with {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusSpiritDamage'}, causing abilities dealing more than {s:MinimumDamage} damage to deal additional damage. Ignores Spirit Resistance.
upgrade_magic_slow_desc: When the target takes Spirit Damage, they have their Move Speed reduced.
upgrade_magic_storm_desc: Imbue an ability with permanent Spirit Power. When that ability is used, gain bonus Move Speed and maintain full speed while attacking.
upgrade_magic_tempo_desc: Imbue an ability to reduce its Cooldown.
upgrade_magic_vulnerability_desc: When the target takes Spirit Damage, they have their Spirit Resist reduced.
upgrade_medic_bullets_desc: Your next bullet will heal you based on what target you hit.
upgrade_melee_charge_desc: Your next Heavy Melee attack against an enemy deals increased damage.
upgrade_melee_rebuttal_desc: On a successful Parry against an enemy Hero, Heal yourself for the damage parried and returns that damage to the target, and temporarily gain increased damage.
upgrade_mod_disruptor_desc: Throw a grenade that explodes on contact and applies silence and increasing amounts of damage to each enemy.
upgrade_mystic_regeneration_desc: Dealing Spirit Damage to enemy Heroes grants you Bonus Health Regen. Stacks when dealing damage to different heroes.
upgrade_mystical_piano_desc: After a short delay, enemies in the target area will be stunned and have their stamina depleted.  After the stun they will be temporarily dazed.
upgrade_nearby_enemy_boost_desc: Gain bonus Weapon Damage and Fire Rate when there are two or more enemy heroes nearby.
upgrade_non_player_bonus_desc: Gain additional {s:NonPlayerBonusWeaponPower}% Weapon Damage when attacking Troopers, Neutrals and Bosses.
upgrade_non_player_bonus_sacrifice_desc: Target an enemy NPC and consume it for {s:BonusSoulsPct}% Bonus Souls and grants a powerful long lasting buff.
upgrade_nullification_aura_deathdamage_d: Deals heavy spirit damage upon your death.
upgrade_nullification_aura_desc: Removes any positive buffs and prevents stamina usage and healing effects on enemies.
upgrade_omnicharge_pendant_desc: Imbue any active non-ultimate ability with Bonus Ability Charges. Already charged items recieve more bonus charges.
upgrade_patrons_blessing_desc: Provides yourself and allies with a powerful spirit focused aura. Has reduced values on allies.
upgrade_patrons_blessing_proc_desc: Dealing significant Damage to an enemy Hero within {s:DamageThresholdDuration}s causes you to heal yourself and nearby allies.
upgrade_personal_rejuvenator_desc: Respawns the hero at the spot they died.
upgrade_phantom_strike_desc: Teleport to an enemy target and pull them to the ground. Dealing damage, Move speed reduction and Disarm.
upgrade_predator_precision_desc: Gain additional weapon damage against enemy Heroes that are low health
upgrade_prism_blast_desc: You enter a void state and become untargetable and invincible for a short duration, during which lasers blast out and rotate around you.
upgrade_pristine_emblem_desc: Your attacks have additional Weapon Damage against enemies above {s:EnemyLifeThreshold}% health.
upgrade_proc_disarm_desc: Your bullets disarm enemies, them preventing them from shooting their weapon. Victims are immune to disarming bullets for {s:ImmunityDuration}s after application expires.
upgrade_proc_melee_stun_desc: The 3rd hit of your melee combo will stun enemies.
upgrade_proc_silence_debuff_desc: Your bullets reduce the target's outgoing spirit damage.
upgrade_proc_silence_desc: Your bullets build up to a Silence. Victims are immune to the build up for {s:ImmunityDuration}s after silence expires.
upgrade_proc_tech_damage_desc: Your bullets also deal your base bullet damage [{s:BaseDamagePerShot}] as spirit damage. Magitech Rounds receives {s:SpellAmplificationMultiplier}x amplification from Spirit Power. Shotguns split the damage between each pellet. This effect can only happen once every {s:ProcCooldown}s.
upgrade_quarantine_desc: Quarantine an enemy Hero, making them invincible but also silencing and disarming them.
upgrade_quick_silver_desc: Your imbued ability charges up over time with {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusSpiritDamage'}, {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusFireRate'}, and bonus bullets on use.
upgrade_rebirth_passive: If you die, after {s:RespawnDelay}s you will respawn at your death location with partial health.
upgrade_recharge_duration_reduction_desc: Reduces the <span class="highlight">recharge duration<%s> of your ability chages.
upgrade_rechargingbullets_desc: Dealing significant {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'WeaponDamage'} replenishes a charge for each of your charged abilities.
upgrade_reduce_debuff_duration_active_de:
Purge all non-ultimate negative effects currently applied to you. If any effects were removed, heal yourself and gain a move speed bonus.
Cannot be used while Stunned or Slept.
upgrade_regenerating_bullet_shield_desc: While you are above {s:LifeThreshold}% health, gain {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'WeaponDamage'} and {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusFireRate'}.
upgrade_regenerative_armor_desc: Gain a short burst of health regeneration when taking bullet damage from heroes
upgrade_reinforcing_casings_desc: Grants Bullet Resist when your bullets hit an enemy hero. Each shot can only grant one stack.
upgrade_rescue_beam_desc: Heals a target allied hero and yourself for a percentage of Max Health. Once while healing, you can Pull the target towards you. Can be self-cast.
upgrade_resonant_healing_desc: Heal and gain bonus Movement Speed for a short duration when you cast an ability.
upgrade_restorative_locket_active_desc:
When an enemy uses an ability within {s:Radius}m range from you, store one Restoration Stack.

Consume all stacks to heal yourself and replenish up to {s:MaxStaminaRestore} stamina based on how many stacks you have.
upgrade_return_fire_desc: Automatically fire a bullet towards any attacker who damages you with their abilities or weapon.
upgrade_ricochet_desc: Your bullets will ricochet on enemies near your target, applying any bullet procs and dealing a percentage of the original damage.
upgrade_rocket_booster_desc:
Launch yourself high into the air and grant yourself a Barrier. While in the air, you can use the active again to drop down faster.

Cannot be used for {s:InterruptCooldown}s if attacked by enemy Hero.
upgrade_rocket_boots_desc: Launch yourself high into the air. Cannot be used for {s:InterruptCooldown}s if damaged by enemy Hero.
upgrade_runed_gauntlets_desc: Everytime you land a heavy melee, your existing cooldowns get reduced.
upgrade_rupture_desc:
Inflict damage over time to a target, dealing damage based on their current health.
Decay's damage is non-lethal and does not apply item procs.
upgrade_self_bubble_desc:
You enter a void state and become untargetable and invincible for a short duration, during which you float slowly and cannot perform actions. Afterwards you gain Spirit Power, Move Speed, and Spirit Resist.
Can be canceled early.
Activation cancels any active ability.
upgrade_shadow_step_passive_desc: Periodically deals Spirit Damage to all nearby enemies.
upgrade_shadow_strike_desc: Go Invisible on Stamina use with no detection range. Doing a melee attack while invisible will cause you to steal bullet and spirit resistance from them and deal damage over time.
upgrade_sharpshooter_desc: Deal additional Weapon Damage when beyond a minimum distance from your target.
upgrade_shivas_bracelet_desc:
Imbued ability has its Cooldown reduced and gains Spirit Power. When the ability deals damage, freeze the target and apply bonus damage.

Cooldown is per target.
upgrade_shrink_ray_desc: Reduces Model Size and grants Move Speed to the target. Allows usage of tunnels in this mode. Can be self-cast.
upgrade_silencer_active: For the next {s:AbilityDuration}s, all your bullets immediately apply Silence. Silence prevents targets from using abilities.
upgrade_silencer_passive1: Your bullets deal +{s:BonusBulletDamageToEMPTargets}% damage to Silenced targets.
upgrade_silencer_passive2: Your bullets build up an EMP on enemy heroes, preventing them from using abilities.
upgrade_siphon_bullets_desc_passive1: When in close range of your target, deal additional Weapon Damage.
upgrade_siphon_bullets_desc_passive2: Your bullets temporarily steal Max HP from enemies. Enemies regain their stolen health when the debuff expires. Permanently steal {s:StealPerKill} stacks of health if a siphoned target dies and lose {s:StackLostPerDeath} stacks if you die.
upgrade_slow_immunity_desc: Purges any roots and chains on use and makes you immune to slows for the duration
upgrade_slowing_bullets_desc: Your bullets build up a Movement Slow on enemies.
upgrade_slowing_tech_desc: Dealing Spirit Damage applies Movement Slows to your target.
upgrade_spellbreaker_desc: The next instance of high spirit damage you take is significantly reduced.
upgrade_spellshield_desc: Block the next Spirit Damage or Debuff, preventing its effects. Only regenerates outside of combat.
upgrade_spellslinger_headshots_part1_des: Your bullets apply a debuff that reduces the Spirit Resist of the target and grants you and your allies Spirit Lifesteal against them.
upgrade_spellslinger_headshots_part2_des: Landing headshots against the target reduces their Spirit Resist further.
upgrade_spirit_bubble_desc: Gain a Barrier whenever you take significant {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDamage'} from enemy Heroes in a small time frame.
upgrade_spirit_burn_desc:
Dealing significant Spirit Damage to an enemy within {s:DamageThresholdDuration}s causes an explosion dealing damage and a burn to nearby enemies. While burning, enemies take damage over time and receive reduced healing.
Deals half-damage and has half-cooldown on non-heroes.
upgrade_spirit_sap_desc: Target an enemy to reduce their Spirit Resist and Spirit Power.
upgrade_spirit_snatch_desc:
When you perform a Light or Heavy Melee attack against a hero, the attack deals extra Spirit Damage and steals Spirit Resist and Spirit Power.

Effects are reduced to {s:LightMeleeScale}% for Light Melee hits.
upgrade_split_shot_desc:
Make your weapon fire multishot.

Hitting more than one Hero per attack will grant a stacking weapon damage bonus.

Targets can only be hit once per multishot.
upgrade_sprint_booster_desc: Increases your forward move speed over time. Taking damage resets the effect for 1.5s
upgrade_stabilizer_desc: Removes the move speed penalty while shooting, and increases bullet speed.
upgrade_stabilizing_tripod_desc: Disarm yourself to toss your weapon to the target location where it transforms into a Field Sentry that will attack enemies using your weapon with an unlimited clip. You can melee the sentry to end the effect early.
upgrade_stasis_bomb_active1: Creates an EMP aura around you and become invincible for {s:AbilityDuration}s, during which it has {s:MoveSpeedMax}m/s move speed and cannot attack, use abilities, or use special moves. Can be self cast.
upgrade_stasis_bomb_active2: If the Stasis lasts the full duration, it will stun and damage nearby enemies.
upgrade_stasis_bomb_desc_passive: Your bullets charge up an EMP on enemy heroes, preventing them from using abilities.
upgrade_succor_desc: Pulls the targeted teammate out of battle and brings them next to you.
upgrade_superacolytes_glove_desc: After dealing an accumulated {s:StoredSpiritDamage} spirit damage, your next Heavy Melee Attack deals an additional {s:StoredSpiritDamage} spirit damage.
upgrade_superior_stamina_passive: Allows an additional use of Air Jump or Air Dash before landing.
upgrade_suppressor_desc: When you deal Spirit Damage to enemies, you also reduce their Fire Rate.
upgrade_surging_power_active: Grants Lifesteal, Fire Rate, and Ammo. This added Ammo is not limited by your max magazine size.
upgrade_target_stun_desc: Apply a Stun after {s:StunDelay}s. Stun duration is increased against airborne targets.
upgrade_targeted_silence_desc:
Launch an expanding projectile which Silences enemies for a short duration and deals impact damage.

Silence does not interrupt channeling abilities.
upgrade_tech_armor_2_desc: Reduces the damage you take from Spirit abilities.
upgrade_tech_armor_desc: Reduces the damage you take from Spirit abilities.
upgrade_tech_armor_reduction_aura_desc: Increases Spirit Damage taken by nearby enemies.
upgrade_tech_bleed_desc: Imbue an ability with Lifesteal and to apply slow on a hit target and deal an additional percentage of the damage dealt to enemies around the target after a short delay.
upgrade_tech_cleave_desc: Your Tech attacks strike additional nearby enemies for 75% of the total damage.
upgrade_tech_damage_pulse_desc: Periodically deals Spirit Damage to the closest two enemies nearby.
upgrade_tech_defender_active: Protect against all spirit damage and debuffs.
upgrade_tech_defense_shredders_desc: Your bullets apply a debuff that reduces the Spirit Resist of the target and grants you and your allies Spirit Lifesteal against them.
upgrade_tech_overflow_desc: Gain bonus Fire Rate and Spirit Power by charging up when shooting enemy heroes.
upgrade_tech_purge_desc: When below {s:HealthThreshold}% health, gain additional Spirit Resist.
upgrade_tech_range_2_desc: Increases your spirit range, aura radius, and effect radius.
upgrade_tech_range_desc: Increases the range and effect radius of your abilities and items.
upgrade_thermal_detonator_desc:
Throw a flask that explodes on contact, creating an area that does increasing Spirit Damage per second and reduces enemy Bullet Resist.

{s:NonHeroReductionPercent}% less effective vs non-heroes.
upgrade_toxic_bullets_desc: Your bullets build up a Bleed on enemies, causing them to lose a percentage of their Max Health over time. Also applies Healing Reduction on the bleeding target.
upgrade_transcendent_cooldown_desc: Reduces the Cooldown of your abilities and items.
upgrade_trophy_collector_desc: Whenever you score an assist or kill, gain extra health, sprint, ability range and passive soul generation. This effect stacks and persists through death.
upgrade_ultimate_burst_desc: Damage from your ultimate applies a {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'Stun'} and deals {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusSpiritDamage'} after a short delay.
upgrade_ultimate_burst_hint: This effect can only trigger once per target per ultimate.
upgrade_unstable_concoction_desc: Consume a concotion that grants you increased speed, health, spirit and weapon damage. After a short duration you die and explode, stunning nearby enemies and dealing damage based on your maximum health.
upgrade_unstoppable_desc:
Temporarily suppress negative status effects and become immune to Stun, Silence, Sleep, Root, and Disarm.
Cannot be used while Stunned or Slept.
upgrade_vampire_desc: Your bullets heal you for a percentage of the damage they deal to enemies. Half as effective vs Non-Heroes.
upgrade_veil_walker_desc: Walking through a cosmic veil grants you Stealth, Heal and increased Move Speed.
upgrade_vex_barrier_desc: Automatically restores one stamina and gain a Barrier when you are movement locked, Stunned, Chained, Immobilized, or Slept.
upgrade_warp_stone_desc: Teleport straight ahead, gaining Bullet Resist.
upgrade_weapon_backstabber_desc: Attacking enemies from behind with your weapon or melee opens a wound dealing {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDPS'} and reducing their bullet resist. During this time, if you or any allies are near the target, will see them through walls and be given {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusMoveSpeed'}.
upgrade_weapon_detention_ammo_desc: Your bullets build up on enemies, causing them to be tethered to their position.
upgrade_weapon_eater_desc:
Reduces Courage by {s:BaseBonusCounter}.
Gain {s:WeaponPowerPerKill} Courage (Up to {s:MaxWeaponPower}) for killing an enemy Hero but lose {s:WeaponPowerPerDeath} gained Courage on Death. Bonus applied if damage was done within {s:KillWindow}s of enemy killed.
upgrade_weapon_instant_reload_desc: Press the [Reload] key while reloading to instantly finish your reload
upgrade_weapon_overdrive_clip_desc: Deal non-lethal damage based on your max health to yourself and reload bullets in your clip equal to your max ammo, no matter how many bullets are left. The bullets in this clip have additional courage.
upgrade_weapon_power_and_health_drain_de: Increase your Courage while draining your own health.
upgrade_weapon_shielding_desc: Gain a Barrier whenever you take significant {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'WeaponDamage'} from enemy Heroes in a small time frame.
upgrade_withering_whip_desc: Target an enemy to reduce their Fire Rate and Bullet Resistance.
upgrade_zipine_mastery_desc: Zip line speed accelerates and allows you to use neutral zip lines and capture them while zip lining. Provides a movement speed bonus when jumping off a zip line whose duration increases the longer you are on the zip line.
viscous_goo_bowling_ball_desc: Morph into a large goo ball that deals damage and stuns enemies on impact. The ball grants large amounts of Bullet and Spirit resist, bounces off walls and can double jump.
viscous_goo_bowling_ball_t3_desc: Can cast abilities and use items while rolling
viscous_goo_grenade_bounce_desc: Multiple hits to the same target deal less damage.
viscous_goo_grenade_desc: Throw a ball of goo that deals damage and leaves puddles of goo behind that apply movement slow to enemies in the radius.
viscous_goo_grenade_puddle_desc: Goo puddles linger on the ground and apply a movement slow to enemies walking on them.
viscous_goo_grenade_quip: Damage enemies and make a mess
viscous_goo_grenade_t3_desc: Bounces 2 times and improves Spirit Scaling
viscous_goo_puddle_desc: Turn yourself into a puddle of goo, becoming immune to harm and dealing damage to nearby enemies.
viscous_gootapult_desc: Charge up and launch yourself, dealing damage and leaving a slowing area on impact.
viscous_restorative_goo_buff_desc: After exiting the cube, the target has increased move speed and stamina recovery for a short duration.
viscous_restorative_goo_desc: Encase the target in a cube of restorative goo that protects from damage, and increases health regen. Target is unable to take any new actions while cubed. Can be used on self. Press {g:citadel_binding:'Mantle'} to escape early.
viscous_restorative_goo_quip: The Cube is a safe place to be
viscous_restorative_goo_t1_desc: Increases Move Speed and Stamina Recovery
viscous_restorative_goo_t3_desc: Removes all non-ult Debuffs and -21s Cooldown
viscous_telepunch_desc:
Materialize a fist in the world that punches everyone in the area, applying {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'KnockUp'}.

Punching an enemy deals {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'MeleeDamage'} and applies {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'Slow'}.
viscous_telepunch_quip: Punch enemies with a giant fist
viscous_telepunch_t3_desc: -12s Cooldown and now deals Heavy Melee Damage
yakuza_kobun_desc: Summons a subordinate gangster to follow a friendly unit and attack enemies closest to that target. Double tap to self cast.
yakuza_protection_racket_desc: Create a protective force shield to protect an ally and increase their crit damage. Purges negative effects on the target when cast.
yakuza_protection_racket_t1_desc: -{s:WeaponRecoilReduction}% Weapon Recoil, -{s:MoveWhileShootingSpeedPenaltyReductionPercent}% move speed reduction when shooting.
yakuza_setting_sun_desc: Call down a precision Gamma Ray blast from orbit, hitting all units in the radius at every height regardless of cover. Units near the center of the beam take more damage.
yakuza_shakedown_target_desc: Send a drone to lock an area down, rooting and damaging enemies in the area. The link between your drones shares a portion of the damage you take with a random rooted enemy.
